list_of_reviews.review_title: Poor customer support
list_of_reviews.review: Poor customer support, cannot withdraw funds, app and website confusing to use. Trust me, don't waste time and enegry using this company platform

list_of_reviews.review_title: Scammers in P2P section as they will…
list_of_reviews.review: Scammers in P2P section as they will held your crypto to the last minute then mark as paid so you cannot take your money back and try to scam it, and the okx support are helping them by not reading the chat of the buyer that refuse to pay via the method that they said in the title.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible experience! Not recommended
list_of_reviews.review: As others have mentioned this company is definitely a scam. I was on Coinbase and opened an account on OKX as Coinbase did not work with my wallet.As soon as my funds came into the account, OKX locked my account and started asking for all kinds of verification without giving any reason. This was within 2 days of opening the account. Do yourself a favor and stay away. Find another exchange to trust with your money and tokens.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Compared to other exchanges
list_of_reviews.review: Compared to other exchanges I've used, OKX stands out as the best in terms of technology and customer support. I've encountered some challenging situations with OKX, but when I reached out to them, I received the assistance I needed. Even though I wasn't entirely satisfied with the outcome, they made an effort to be as objective and informative as possible. I commend the team, but I recommend improving the KYC tools.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Beware
list_of_reviews.review: Beware! Never open up an account with OKX! You will have a lot of hazzle only, because their customer service does not work anymore. OKX suspends your account and asks for verification all of a sudden with no apparent reason. Maybe because they got hacked a few months ago?I can't use their QR-Code link for renewal of the verification, since I do not have a smartphone. I could open up an account and fund it - without smartphone, but now, I can't renew verification anymore without a smartphone?They do no longer accept verification by email or computer. But even when friends help out with a smartphone, OKX system does not work either. I only get error messages like: "verfication failed" or "selfie does not match passport". I had more than twenty failed  attempts to do the verfication that way. Customer support first promised to send me a specified jumio email link for verification, but then they withdrew and just emailed me: "Try again". This is no support, this is customer mobbing!

list_of_reviews.review_title: SHOULD BE A SCAM FROM THERE LEVEL OR PROFESSIONALISM
list_of_reviews.review: THESE PEOPLE WILL HOLD YOUR COINS HOSTAGE MAKE YOU VERFIY AND THEN NOT EVEN ALLOW YOU TO TRADE THOSE COINS BECAUSE OF A REASON THEY WONT EXPLAIN. VERY POOR SERVICE AND CUSTOMER CARE. PLEASE AVIOD

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is my favourite crypto exchange
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is my favourite crypto exchange. I've been using it for many years and it keeps getting better. Recently they integrated iDEAL which allows me to buy crypto basically for free.

list_of_reviews.review_title: ITS A SCAM
list_of_reviews.review: This company is a scam and worked with a company called smm limited. I tried to withdraw 3500.00 from my wallet and they asked me to pay 1750.00 to show i am legitimate  once I had done that they asked me for a further 4200.00 which buy this stage I made further investigations and I did not pay as I realize its a scam. I contacted the FCA and Action Fraud who confirmed my suspicions. the names to look out for our Anthony, Lucy White and Lucas Graf Claims to be OKX. I would advise anybody against crypto companies or people claiming to get your money back they are all fraudsters. SMM limited have now taken down there website (What a Surprise) I have only lost a small amount but I have now met people or spoken to them who have lost over £50000 and I mean well over. The strange thing is okx don't even have a phone number that you can contact and how can they be the 3rd main sponsor of Manchester City. Please be warned.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Company with Arrogant Customer…
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible Company with Arrogant Customer Service…. My Account has been hijacked and they refuse to Unlock my Withdraw or return my money. Tread lightly with this platform. They tell you that they comply with Government Regulations and Federal Reserve Policy which is all a Scam.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst KYC support ever
list_of_reviews.review: Worst KYC support ever. You give them everything they want and even more, and they still cant approve your account due to an error. So incompetent, probably even selling your info as we speak. Im running away from this shady Exchange.7 times retried my KYC, still rejected.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Deposit Hijacked for 5 days
list_of_reviews.review: When making a deposit to OKX.com they hijack your money for 5 days. No withdrawals, no transfers. Also USDT trading pairs are no longer available for EU customers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account frozen
list_of_reviews.review: As mentioned by many others, same issue, frozen my account with funds blocked without any explanation. Support gives only generic responses, don't waste your time.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible exchange
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible exchange. I did everything they asked me to comply by their regulations.  I made a copy of my ID , a picture of myself with my ID, a copy of my bank account,  all the details how I saved the amount of money I was depositing. And then they blocked my deposit as I was a fraudster or scammer. But of course I had to understand that blocking my account is for my own good and safety, right??! GO F. YOURSELVES  OKX!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account frozen once they did Australian…
list_of_reviews.review: Account frozen once they did Australian migration. This has been second time. They did that before because they wanted a quick response for sanction form. For any compliance things, their quick fix is to freeze customer accounts. The management looks quite incompetent in handling account matters. Don’t think they understand what it means to freeze someone’s account without written notices and warnings. Their parent company already verified me before and now with Aussie migration they are re-verifying everyone in Australia with an excuse that’s its regulatory requirement. Why couldn’t do pre-migration! Incompetence at its heights. Don’t waste you time. This exchange will surprise you!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Good platform with verificated users
list_of_reviews.review: Good platform with verificated users, any problem can be resolved with support what is working 24/7 its best  place for p2p trading, but be careful and work only with vereficated supermerchants and check how much they did deals at last 30 days with 96% its okay if lower here you must make double check. Gold rule same name for profile and bank account its must be same for 100% in other case is can be scam. Wasnt problems with that platform

list_of_reviews.review_title: There is no good support on the…
list_of_reviews.review: There is no good support on the official platform. When there are questions about the services or any type of problem such as account theft, they only respond to emails with already prepared texts.I tried to contact someone from support in other ways but there are many impostors. I wanted to make a report by email and they only responded that my account was closed due to suspicious actions. For more information see the terms x.x. Customer service is almost non-existent and they take no action to prevent problems

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account has been frozen
list_of_reviews.review: Account has been frozen, and not one support person will speak to me, I've verified my account months ago, prior to new regulations incoming in Australia. Now I'm frozen and the system wants me to close positiona and do tasks I'm not able to while it's frozen, I'm widowed mum about to take her first holiday with my son, days no response and can't get my money to pay for rest of our plans...RUINED! RUINED RUINED!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid! Most disgusting platform ever!
list_of_reviews.review: I started with them ten days ago. Only bad experiences. First, they released my USDT to a buyer who clicked "paid" and didn't pay. I fighted to them one week until they returned my crypto into my account. Second, then I tried to withdrawall my USDT to other platform, as last step was they asked me for authentification code, but they never sent it to me. I contacted the support but they done nothing. Also they modified my login password and for reset it, you need again an authentification code wich they never send. Absolutely scammers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Support okx - bad people
list_of_reviews.review: There is virtually no user support.  Transferred a token with an incorrect memo.  They said they would help, everything was fine, he provided all the screenshots of the address, hashes, everything that was needed.  4 days have passed, support does not respond, does not respond at all, even new tickets do not respond, deadlines were not specified, tokens never arrived, there is no connection with support, only the chat bot talks to me.  Disrespectful attitude towards clients, deception of clients!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Try to withdraw my money

Get a mail under investigation.When I respond to this mail I don't get answers. Only reminder that I didn't respond.No good first month experience. I ask myself is this a legimit company or they Stealng my money!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Good platform with verificated users

Gold rule same name for profile and bank account its must be same for 100% in other case is can be scam. Wasnt problems with that platform

list_of_reviews.review_title: Easy interface to trade crypto
list_of_reviews.review: An easy interface for buying, selling and tracking your crypto. It did take a while to figure out how to withdraw USDT to my AU bank account. (click buy, look for sell option) If you used Banxa while depositing, and verified your bank account, the process is simple. I've had no problems with any transaction yet.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My OKX account has been suspended and I…
list_of_reviews.review: My OKX account has been suspended and I have not received any email yet from OKX. The support is telling me that I will receive it but does not give me any timeframe even if I have asked kindly for many times and is not telling me the reason why this happened. Time is passing and I have no information. Please at least inform me regarding the reason this happened, because for now I am just kept without any information.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst KYC support ever
list_of_reviews.review: Worst KYC support ever. You give them everything they want and even more, and they still cant approve your account due to an error. So incompetent, probably even selling your info as we speak. Im running away from this shady Exchange.7 times retried my KYC, still rejected.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Beware
list_of_reviews.review: Beware! Never open up an account with OKX! You will have a lot of hazzle only, because their customer service does not work anymore. OKX suspends your account and asks for verification all of a sudden with no apparent reason. Maybe because they got hacked a few months ago?I can't use their QR-Code link for renewal of the verification, since I do not have a smartphone. I could open up an account and fund it - without smartphone, but now, I can't renew verification anymore without a smartphone?They do no longer accept verification by email or computer. But even when friends help out with a smartphone, OKX system does not work either. I only get error messages like: "verfication failed" or "selfie does not match passport". I had more than twenty failed  attempts to do the verfication that way. Customer support first promised to send me a specified jumio email link for verification, but then they withdrew and just emailed me: "Try again". This is no support, this is customer mobbing!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account has been frozen
list_of_reviews.review: Account has been frozen, and not one support person will speak to me, I've verified my account months ago, prior to new regulations incoming in Australia. Now I'm frozen and the system wants me to close positiona and do tasks I'm not able to while it's frozen, I'm widowed mum about to take her first holiday with my son, days no response and can't get my money to pay for rest of our plans...RUINED! RUINED RUINED!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Terrible Company with Arrogant Customer…
list_of_reviews.review: Terrible Company with Arrogant Customer Service…. My Account has been hijacked and they refuse to Unlock my Withdraw or return my money. Tread lightly with this platform. They tell you that they comply with Government Regulations and Federal Reserve Policy which is all a Scam.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews of the service reveal a dichotomy in user experience, with positive feedback emphasizing the platform's trustworthiness, competitive fees, and a user-friendly interface. However, there are significant concerns raised by some users, including difficulties with account access, unsatisfactory customer service, and encounters with scams. A standout positive aspect is the customer support, which is frequently described as highly effective, with support personnel commended for their responsiveness and dedication to resolving issues. The key differentiators influencing user perception appear to be individual experiences, particularly with customer support, and the personal value users derive from the service. To enhance user satisfaction, the company should investigate the account access and customer service complaints, and take steps to mitigate scam-related issues, ensuring these improvements are communicated clearly to users.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Compared to other exchanges
list_of_reviews.review: Compared to other exchanges I've used, OKX stands out as the best in terms of technology and customer support. I've encountered some challenging situations with OKX, but when I reached out to them, I received the assistance I needed. Even though I wasn't entirely satisfied with the outcome, they made an effort to be as objective and informative as possible. I commend the team, but I recommend improving the KYC tools.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst KYC support ever
list_of_reviews.review: Worst KYC support ever. You give them everything they want and even more, and they still cant approve your account due to an error. So incompetent, probably even selling your info as we speak. Im running away from this shady Exchange.7 times retried my KYC, still rejected.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account has been frozen
list_of_reviews.review: Account has been frozen, and not one support person will speak to me, I've verified my account months ago, prior to new regulations incoming in Australia. Now I'm frozen and the system wants me to close positiona and do tasks I'm not able to while it's frozen, I'm widowed mum about to take her first holiday with my son, days no response and can't get my money to pay for rest of our plans...RUINED! RUINED RUINED!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account frozen once they did Australian…
list_of_reviews.review: Account frozen once they did Australian migration. This has been second time. They did that before because they wanted a quick response for sanction form. For any compliance things, their quick fix is to freeze customer accounts. The management looks quite incompetent in handling account matters. Don’t think they understand what it means to freeze someone’s account without written notices and warnings. Their parent company already verified me before and now with Aussie migration they are re-verifying everyone in Australia with an excuse that’s its regulatory requirement. Why couldn’t do pre-migration! Incompetence at its heights. Don’t waste you time. This exchange will surprise you!

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is my favourite crypto exchange
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is my favourite crypto exchange. I've been using it for many years and it keeps getting better. Recently they integrated iDEAL which allows me to buy crypto basically for free.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Beware
list_of_reviews.review: Beware! Never open up an account with OKX! You will have a lot of hazzle only, because their customer service does not work anymore. OKX suspends your account and asks for verification all of a sudden with no apparent reason. Maybe because they got hacked a few months ago?I can't use their QR-Code link for renewal of the verification, since I do not have a smartphone. I could open up an account and fund it - without smartphone, but now, I can't renew verification anymore without a smartphone?They do no longer accept verification by email or computer. But even when friends help out with a smartphone, OKX system does not work either. I only get error messages like: "verfication failed" or "selfie does not match passport". I had more than twenty failed  attempts to do the verfication that way. Customer support first promised to send me a specified jumio email link for verification, but then they withdrew and just emailed me: "Try again". This is no support, this is customer mobbing!

Gold rule same name for profile and bank account its must be same for 100% in other case is can be scam. Wasnt problems with that platform

Both the OKX Exchange and the Web3 Wallet are exceptional.The exchange offers speed, reliability, and robust security. The Web3 Wallet is beyond perfect, with an intuitive interface, excellent security, and seamless DeFi integration.Highly recommended for anyone seeking top-tier crypto services.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Support okx - bad people
list_of_reviews.review: There is virtually no user support.  Transferred a token with an incorrect memo.  They said they would help, everything was fine, he provided all the screenshots of the address, hashes, everything that was needed.  4 days have passed, support does not respond, does not respond at all, even new tickets do not respond, deadlines were not specified, tokens never arrived, there is no connection with support, only the chat bot talks to me.  Disrespectful attitude towards clients, deception of clients!

list_of_reviews.review_title: They FROZEN your FUNDS without apparent reason
list_of_reviews.review: One of the worst cryptocurrency in the crypto market at the moment. If you do transactions over 8k $ they are gonna freeze your account without warning and they won't allow you to withdraw them. Costumer support is repetitive and they main function is too ask for the same questions over and over untill the user 's patience implodes

list_of_reviews.review_title: Can't exchange in UK
list_of_reviews.review: Can't exchange in UK, can't seem to sell either, what's the actual point? I guess its fine in US, but if they don't have the feature of being able to trade in UK, why ****ing bother releasing it here???

list_of_reviews.review_title: Try to withdraw my money
list_of_reviews.review: Try to transfer money to a wallet of mine. OKX blocks the transaction and with every mail I don't get respons.Tried to withdraw my money to my private account. Get a mail under investigation.When I respond to this mail I don't get answers. Only reminder that I didn't respond.No good first month experience. I ask myself is this a legimit company or they Stealng my money!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Slow withdrawal, no trading pairs
list_of_reviews.review: First I was surprised for EU not have USDT pairs, which immediately makes the exchange useless and not competitive. Decide leave this exchange and move money to another exchange. And second surprise they work how they want System showed me by TONCHAIN withdrawal should be 3-8 minutes, now waiting more than 40 minutes, still not processed, and not in withdrawal history I see, they can processing transaction 24 hours. Totally disappointed

list_of_reviews.review_title: THIEVES AND SCAM !
list_of_reviews.review: Opened an acount with them 3 years ago, but the regulation has evolved in Europe, and OKX is no more available in my country (France).Now the verification process is impossible and I can't withdraw my money. And OKX won't give it back ! Customer service is the worst ever as they won't help to get your money back, be aware of that.WORST CRYPTO EXCHANGE EVER ! OKX IS A SCAM ! DO NOT TRUST THEM !

list_of_reviews.review_title: It is impossible to withdraw money.
list_of_reviews.review: It is impossible to withdraw money.. They blocked the ton blockchain on purpose so that people would sing the money after NOT launching…Very bad company!

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX, what a mess
list_of_reviews.review: they are only good with wash trade to show fake volume to the public, other than that, i had terrible experience in approving my KYC, their compliance based on jurisdiction can change and be forced at any time unnecessarily, which shows they fear facing proper regulations to hide the circus show running inside their organization, my feeling is this exchange is trying whatever for attention and attracting new customers but at the same they fear the serious regulatory due to their shady internal practice, I would not recommend them, whatever web3, blockchain, oklink, failing trading products.. whatever they are bragging about, real actions speak of itself, so good luck with your exchange, and btw you will never bypass Binance, unless Binance collapse by itself (which could happen, as those guys have also shady stuff which they are dealing with ), you can say that to Stars (your CEX "founder" )  if he is dreaming to be number 1 exchange, tell him, you will never beoverall, OKX with all ads, obtaining and withdrawing licenses, going in and being kicked out of countries, as i said, they are running a zoo not an exchange

list_of_reviews.review_title: Compared to other exchanges
list_of_reviews.review: Compared to other exchanges I've used, OKX stands out as the best in terms of technology and customer support. I've encountered some challenging situations with OKX, but when I reached out to them, I received the assistance I needed. Even though I wasn't entirely satisfied with the outcome, they made an effort to be as objective and informative as possible. I commend the team, but I recommend improving the KYC tools.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Good platform with verificated users
list_of_reviews.review: Good platform with verificated users, any problem can be resolved with support what is working 24/7 its best  place for p2p trading, but be careful and work only with vereficated supermerchants and check how much they did deals at last 30 days with 96% its okay if lower here you must make double check. Gold rule same name for profile and bank account its must be same for 100% in other case is can be scam. Wasnt problems with that platform

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account has been frozen
list_of_reviews.review: Account has been frozen, and not one support person will speak to me, I've verified my account months ago, prior to new regulations incoming in Australia. Now I'm frozen and the system wants me to close positiona and do tasks I'm not able to while it's frozen, I'm widowed mum about to take her first holiday with my son, days no response and can't get my money to pay for rest of our plans...RUINED! RUINED RUINED!

Positive feedback highlights the company's ability to provide prompt responses, useful guidance, reliable tools, and a sense of trust. However, negative reviews criticize the lack of personal engagement, insufficient context-specific details, and the repetitive, promotional nature of the content, which suggests the possibility of bot-generated posts. The average rating of 2.67 indicates generally low user satisfaction, with notable dissatisfaction among users. To improve, the company should focus on enhancing personal engagement, providing more context-specific information, and ensuring that content is genuinely human-generated to address the concerns of authenticity and relevance.

The Web3 Wallet is beyond perfect, with an intuitive interface, excellent security, and seamless DeFi integration.Highly recommended for anyone seeking top-tier crypto services.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Compared to other exchanges

I've encountered some challenging situations with OKX, but when I reached out to them, I received the assistance I needed. Even though I wasn't entirely satisfied with the outcome, they made an effort to be as objective and informative as possible. I commend the team, but I recommend improving the KYC tools.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Customer Support that does nothings and stops replying to emails

Really, I don't understand how these companies survive with such bad customer service.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Should be banned
list_of_reviews.review: After a bad experience with trying to withdraw my money from ft-trader they transferred it all to okx bank after making me open an account.  Okx said l had deposited more than my £5000 allowed so l needed to pay 10% of the deposit to verify it. They said my deposit plus the 10% would be refunded after verification within 2-3 hours. Because this was £3000+ l could   not do it but the ft-trader so called financial adviser said he would sort it. He asked me for £400 and guess what he has now dissappeared along with all my money. How did OKX allow my funds to be withdrawn without my say so when they stipulated that the 10% had to come from a bank bearing an account in my name!!! I am nearly 82 and before you say it l know l have been scammed but OKX released my funds without my permission and all l get is an automated bot telling me l have not signed in. KEEP WELL CLEAR PEOPLE

I am very disappointed with their service and I would recommend people to be mindful when joining in.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They froze my account and werent willing to help

No result. the problem was never solved although I gave all information every time again. Never seen people being so desinterested in resolving your issue and being so neglecting in their service. Never wrote a negative review before. Felt that I had too when I saw more people encoutering the same issue.

list_of_reviews.review_title: It is a scam , they still your money without any reason
list_of_reviews.review: This okx is the biggest wallet fraud, the biggest mistake you can make is to deposit or exchange with this platform or broker, things will not stay like this, changing times are coming for these thieves.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Support okx - bad people
list_of_reviews.review: There is virtually no user support.  Transferred a token with an incorrect memo.  They said they would help, everything was fine, he provided all the screenshots of the address, hashes, everything that was needed.  4 days have passed, support does not respond, does not respond at all, even new tickets do not respond, deadlines were not specified, tokens never arrived, there is no connection with support, only the chat bot talks to me.  Disrespectful attitude towards clients, deception of clients!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Nah, thank you, but no thank you.
list_of_reviews.review: Nah, good that i transfered money out there.Now for the last bits i have an interesting support case...I do not see my support ticket in their backend, also their knowledge base about their own system is totally outdated.Just save your time, do not go there.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They FROZEN your FUNDS without apparent reason
list_of_reviews.review: One of the worst cryptocurrency in the crypto market at the moment. If you do transactions over 8k $ they are gonna freeze your account without warning and they won't allow you to withdraw them. Costumer support is repetitive and they main function is too ask for the same questions over and over untill the user 's patience implodes

list_of_reviews.review_title: Fiord intel . Tech
list_of_reviews.review: I had the worse of experience with this company, I signed up an account with them and made deposit which I regret putting so much money, because my money vanished and they cut communication with me. My displayed picture is a website address who got me out all my money

list_of_reviews.review_title: Good platform with verificated users
list_of_reviews.review: Good platform with verificated users, any problem can be resolved with support what is working 24/7 its best  place for p2p trading, but be careful and work only with vereficated supermerchants and check how much they did deals at last 30 days with 96% its okay if lower here you must make double check. Gold rule same name for profile and bank account its must be same for 100% in other case is can be scam. Wasnt problems with that platform

list_of_reviews.review_title: Compared to other exchanges
list_of_reviews.review: Compared to other exchanges I've used, OKX stands out as the best in terms of technology and customer support. I've encountered some challenging situations with OKX, but when I reached out to them, I received the assistance I needed. Even though I wasn't entirely satisfied with the outcome, they made an effort to be as objective and informative as possible. I commend the team, but I recommend improving the KYC tools.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is my favourite crypto exchange
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is my favourite crypto exchange. I've been using it for many years and it keeps getting better. Recently they integrated iDEAL which allows me to buy crypto basically for free.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Easy interface to trade crypto
list_of_reviews.review: An easy interface for buying, selling and tracking your crypto. It did take a while to figure out how to withdraw USDT to my AU bank account. (click buy, look for sell option) If you used Banxa while depositing, and verified your bank account, the process is simple. I've had no problems with any transaction yet.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Can't exchange in UK
list_of_reviews.review: Can't exchange in UK, can't seem to sell either, what's the actual point? I guess its fine in US, but if they don't have the feature of being able to trade in UK, why ****ing bother releasing it here???

list_of_reviews.review_title: Customer Support that does nothings and stops replying to emails
list_of_reviews.review: I processed a withdrawal, but the transaction is shown as pending/ not executed because of a system glitch (I will assume). It has been three weeks, and now they have stopped replying.Thank God it is a small amount; otherwise, I would have been in despair. Really, I don't understand how these companies survive with such bad customer service.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Should be banned
list_of_reviews.review: After a bad experience with trying to withdraw my money from ft-trader they transferred it all to okx bank after making me open an account.  Okx said l had deposited more than my £5000 allowed so l needed to pay 10% of the deposit to verify it. They said my deposit plus the 10% would be refunded after verification within 2-3 hours. Because this was £3000+ l could   not do it but the ft-trader so called financial adviser said he would sort it. He asked me for £400 and guess what he has now dissappeared along with all my money. How did OKX allow my funds to be withdrawn without my say so when they stipulated that the 10% had to come from a bank bearing an account in my name!!! I am nearly 82 and before you say it l know l have been scammed but OKX released my funds without my permission and all l get is an automated bot telling me l have not signed in. KEEP WELL CLEAR PEOPLE

Like you, I was a victim and tried every solution available to me, including reaching out to customer service and seeking legal counsel, but all of it was in vain. After I started trading with Tomver, I was able to find happiness again because I had lost too much money to be content with them. questioned why they continue to operate.

list_of_reviews.review_title: they trust an idiot who thinks he is smart to run an exchange
list_of_reviews.review: i can see all of sudden fake positive reviews by their department, hopeless exchange run by pathetic sales and bds. its enough that their customers got "hacked" easily with millions recently. Hear me clearly to whoever guides to write those fake positive reviews, your director "Star" will fire your idiot boss soon, and better you compensate the rest, because you provide absolutely no security to people funds, and keep your web3 and nft games ads, going, because its matching your business model, all BS

list_of_reviews.review_title: Rescue from fraud and return to OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Hello dear friendsI want to share with you a problem that happened to me yesterdayI transferred 500 USDT from OKX to another exchange that I don't want to name and it's between me and OKX because I'm a privacy advocate.A new member who doesn't know how to trade on P2P placed an order from 20:52And until 5:21 o'clock in the morning, the exchange that has no good status in Trust Pilot opened the order, but finally canceled the order and I quickly returned the USDT to OKX.I lost 2 USDT in this transition, but the important thing is that now I can go to bed in peaceI don't agree with many of the comments I read about OKX in TrustPilot because I have been a member of OKX since April 2020 and I have not seen any suspicious or bad behavior from them and in my opinion they are working very well.Thank you OKX collection

list_of_reviews.review_title: Customer Support that does nothings and stops replying to emails
list_of_reviews.review: I processed a withdrawal, but the transaction is shown as pending/ not executed because of a system glitch (I will assume). It has been three weeks, and now they have stopped replying.Thank God it is a small amount; otherwise, I would have been in despair. Really, I don't understand how these companies survive with such bad customer service.July 5 - day 46, and still, I am waiting for the "relevant department" to confirm that they have not executed the wire transfer. Just imagine more complex matters how they take care. STAY AWAY, so many more companies with decent customer service support.

list_of_reviews.review: I traded and transferred my earned profit to OKX wallet after paying taxes, all legal and clear , they seized the money and terminated my Account. Over 250k are gone and customer service all what they say you violated the rules reference 7.8, will take legal actions.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I'm not sure why many people are giving…
list_of_reviews.review: I'm not sure why many people are giving negative reviews on OKX , For me it's better than Binance, actually, it's the best platform when it comes to P2P support , quick and fair enough for both sides . I got scammed once, but it was my fault and they couldn't help it. So, i don't blame them , try BYBIT to see the difference in CS that can take weeks to respond if they ever respond leaving you and your loss alone . As a super merchant for almost a year and a regular customer for two years , I'm satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trading from 2018 here and always super experience
list_of_reviews.review: Trading here from 2018 and what can I tell you: good user experience... no... best user experience. I added few proposals and they implemented. It super important. Good products: you can trade on spot or with bots, for me these two products are the best. And of course Earn. Just, explore and you will face with good community, fast and smart CS, best products in industry. And also look for promo campaigns, sometimes they are super interesting!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Should be banned
list_of_reviews.review: After a bad experience with trying to withdraw my money from ft-trader they transferred it all to okx bank after making me open an account.  Okx said l had deposited more than my £5000 allowed so l needed to pay 10% of the deposit to verify it. They said my deposit plus the 10% would be refunded after verification within 2-3 hours. Because this was £3000+ l could   not do it but the ft-trader so called financial adviser said he would sort it. He asked me for £400 and guess what he has now dissappeared along with all my money. How did OKX allow my funds to be withdrawn without my say so when they stipulated that the 10% had to come from a bank bearing an account in my name!!! I am nearly 82 and before you say it l know l have been scammed but OKX released my funds without my permission and all l get is an automated bot telling me l have not signed in. KEEP WELL CLEAR PEOPLE

list_of_reviews.review_title: Very good exchange with lots of nice localised features
list_of_reviews.review: Good User Experience and lots of nice features. Especially good for new crypto users due to its toggle mode between beginner and advanced users. Very wide range of EUR-trading pairs and easy local payment on and off ramps.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Had been complaining for over a week…
list_of_reviews.review: Had been complaining for over a week about uploading the right documents (had read through all the requirements) and the system not accepting it for no reason.  Customer service have not helped at all. They came back saying ''unacceptable proof'' and giving me every type of excuse which was not valid, while everything I uploaded was up to date. I am very disappointed with their service and I would recommend people to be mindful when joining in.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Support okx - bad people
list_of_reviews.review: There is virtually no user support.  Transferred a token with an incorrect memo.  They said they would help, everything was fine, he provided all the screenshots of the address, hashes, everything that was needed.  4 days have passed, support does not respond, does not respond at all, even new tickets do not respond, deadlines were not specified, tokens never arrived, there is no connection with support, only the chat bot talks to me.  Disrespectful attitude towards clients, deception of clients!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I won't stop writing until I get back…
list_of_reviews.review: I won't stop writing until I get back all I put in. I don't know why I have to go through all these hassles to get my money. It wasn't this hard putting it in but when I intend to withdraw, they bringing up various excuses. I would have been getting the benefits of an exclusive clients had I put all that money in with     echelonis      elitus.    They are the only platform with offerings you can always rely on. Stay away from this pit hole.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They froze my account and werent willing to help
list_of_reviews.review: They froze my account. For two months I have been sending them emails, all followed by the same question from okx: send me screenshots. I have send the same screenshots a million times without getting any further. Every time you speak to another person as it seems. it took a lot of time, money and energy...without getting anywhere. No result. the problem was never solved although I gave all information every time again. Never seen people being so desinterested in resolving your issue and being so neglecting in their service. Never wrote a negative review before. Felt that I had too when I saw more people encoutering the same issue.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They FROZEN your FUNDS without apparent reason
list_of_reviews.review: One of the worst cryptocurrency in the crypto market at the moment. If you do transactions over 8k $ they are gonna freeze your account without warning and they won't allow you to withdraw them. Costumer support is repetitive and they main function is too ask for the same questions over and over untill the user 's patience implodes

list_of_reviews.review_title: Should be banned
list_of_reviews.review: After a bad experience with trying to withdraw my money from ft-trader they transferred it all to okx bank after making me open an account.  Okx said l had deposited more than my £5000 allowed so l needed to pay 10% of the deposit to verify it. They said my deposit plus the 10% would be refunded after verification within 2-3 hours. Because this was £3000+ l could   not do it but the ft-trader so called financial adviser said he would sort it. He asked me for £400 and guess what he has now dissappeared along with all my money. How did OKX allow my funds to be withdrawn without my say so when they stipulated that the 10% had to come from a bank bearing an account in my name!!! I am nearly 82 and before you say it l know l have been scammed but OKX released my funds without my permission and all l get is an automated bot telling me l have not signed in. KEEP WELL CLEAR PEOPLE

list_of_reviews.review_title: Funds Blocked and Unresponsive Support on OKX
list_of_reviews.review: For nearly a year, my funds have been unjustly blocked on OKX without any valid reason. Despite providing all the required documents for KYC verification, including an official bank statement with my full name, address, transaction history, and official stamps, my verification has been repeatedly rejected without specific explanations.I have spent countless hours trying to resolve this issue with OKX support, but my efforts have been in vain. My requests are met with automated responses, and the support team fails to provide any clear guidance or assistance. This lack of communication and transparency has led to severe personal and financial difficulties.It seems that my situation is not unique, as other users have reported similar experiences where their funds were suddenly blocked, and no documents were accepted. This raises serious concerns about the integrity and reliability of OKX as a platform.I am left with no choice but to warn others about the potential risks of using OKX. If you value your funds and want a platform that provides responsive and transparent support, I strongly advise considering other options.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I did not have a positive experience…

list_of_reviews.review_title: Funds Blocked and Unresponsive Support on OKX
list_of_reviews.review: For nearly a year, my funds have been unjustly blocked on OKX without any valid reason. Despite providing all the required documents for KYC verification, including an official bank statement with my full name, address, transaction history, and official stamps, my verification has been repeatedly rejected without specific explanations.I have spent countless hours trying to resolve this issue with OKX support, but my efforts have been in vain. My requests are met with automated responses, and the support team fails to provide any clear guidance or assistance. This lack of communication and transparency has led to severe personal and financial difficulties.It seems that my situation is not unique, as other users have reported similar experiences where their funds were suddenly blocked, and no documents were accepted. This raises serious concerns about the integrity and reliability of OKX as a platform.I am left with no choice but to warn others about the potential risks of using OKX. If you value your funds and want a platform that provides responsive and transparent support, I strongly advise considering other options.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Dont trust company without good support!
list_of_reviews.review: At first they looked like decent company, but after several months it quickly became unprofessional. They don't have adequate support (sometimes non existent at all). Later they banned my account (thank god i didn't had any money left there) because i broke "a rule" from section 2 and 3 of ToS. without giving detailed reason at all. Any tries to contact them was pointless.If you want to play with fire, you can try them... but i highly recommend against it. The only plus they had was great rates for buying bitcoins...

list_of_reviews.review_title: Disgusting service
list_of_reviews.review: Disgusting service, high handed and unfriendly attitude. Because I took 2 hours to reply to their questions they imposed extra verification requirements. They have frozen my account with £1600 in it and I have no idea how to unfreeze it. I asked for help with the verification process but they said this is not a service they offer. It is impossible to actually speak to anyone there. Suggest this company is avoided at all costs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Should be banned

Okx said l had deposited more than my £5000 allowed so l needed to pay 10% of the deposit to verify it. They said my deposit plus the 10% would be refunded after verification within 2-3 hours. Because this was £3000+ l could   not do it but the ft-trader so called financial adviser said he would sort it. He asked me for £400 and guess what he has now dissappeared along with all my money. How did OKX allow my funds to be withdrawn without my say so when they stipulated that the 10% had to come from a bank bearing an account in my name!!! I am nearly 82 and before you say it l know l have been scammed but OKX released my funds without my permission and all l get is an automated bot telling me l have not signed in. KEEP WELL CLEAR PEOPLE

list_of_reviews.review_title: Funds Blocked and Unresponsive Support on OKX
list_of_reviews.review: For nearly a year, my funds have been unjustly blocked on OKX without any valid reason. Despite providing all the required documents for KYC verification, including an official bank statement with my full name, address, transaction history, and official stamps, my verification has been repeatedly rejected without specific explanations.I have spent countless hours trying to resolve this issue with OKX support, but my efforts have been in vain. My requests are met with automated responses, and the support team fails to provide any clear guidance or assistance. This lack of communication and transparency has led to severe personal and financial difficulties.It seems that my situation is not unique, as other users have reported similar experiences where their funds were suddenly blocked, and no documents were accepted. This raises serious concerns about the integrity and reliability of OKX as a platform.I am left with no choice but to warn others about the potential risks of using OKX. If you value your funds and want a platform that provides responsive and transparent support, I strongly advise considering other options.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Disgusting service
list_of_reviews.review: Disgusting service, high handed and unfriendly attitude. Because I took 2 hours to reply to their questions they imposed extra verification requirements. They have frozen my account with £1600 in it and I have no idea how to unfreeze it. I asked for help with the verification process but they said this is not a service they offer. It is impossible to actually speak to anyone there. Suggest this company is avoided at all costs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I don't mean to sound impolite
list_of_reviews.review: I don't mean to sound impolite, but it would be best for you if you accepted that your money was lost as soon as possible. Like you, I was a victim and tried every solution available to me, including reaching out to customer service and seeking legal counsel, but all of it was in vain. After I started trading with Tomver, I was able to find happiness again because I had lost too much money to be content with them. questioned why they continue to operate.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Rescue from fraud and return to OKX

So, i don't blame them , try BYBIT to see the difference in CS that can take weeks to respond if they ever respond leaving you and your loss alone . list_of_reviews.review_title: Rescue from fraud and return to OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Hello dear friendsI want to share with you a problem that happened to me yesterdayI transferred 500 USDT from OKX to another exchange that I don't want to name and it's between me and OKX because I'm a privacy advocate.A new member who doesn't know how to trade on P2P placed an order from 20:52And until 5:21 o'clock in the morning, the exchange that has no good status in Trust Pilot opened the order, but finally canceled the order and I quickly returned the USDT to OKX.I lost 2 USDT in this transition, but the important thing is that now I can go to bed in peaceI don't agree with many of the comments I read about OKX in TrustPilot because I have been a member of OKX since April 2020 and I have not seen any suspicious or bad behavior from them and in my opinion they are working very well.Thank you OKX collection

list_of_reviews.review_title: I'm not sure why many people are giving…
list_of_reviews.review: I'm not sure why many people are giving negative reviews on OKX , For me it's better than Binance, actually, it's the best platform when it comes to P2P support , quick and fair enough for both sides . I got scammed once, but it was my fault and they couldn't help it. So, i don't blame them , try BYBIT to see the difference in CS that can take weeks to respond if they ever respond leaving you and your loss alone . As a super merchant for almost a year and a regular customer for two years , I'm satisfied.

They said they would help, everything was fine, he provided all the screenshots of the address, hashes, everything that was needed.  4 days have passed, support does not respond, does not respond at all, even new tickets do not respond, deadlines were not specified, tokens never arrived, there is no connection with support, only the chat bot talks to me. list_of_reviews.review_title: They can confiscate your tokens

list_of_reviews.review_title: This wallet is just scamming users.

They blocked my account and do not allow me to convert my assest to transfer them to my bank account. So they are basically  telling me : F*** YOU!I did not do anything wrong, I reported I was being scammed and this lovely poeple, instead of helping me they also rob me!!F**** incredible. Customer service only reply with templates, they do not read the information and they do not share any empathy. worse service ever and thieves!!Run away from this wallet!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Dont trust company without good support!

Any tries to contact them was pointless.If you want to play with fire, you can try them... but i highly recommend against it. The only plus they had was great rates for buying bitcoins...

list_of_reviews.review_title: I did not have a positive experience…

list_of_reviews.review_title: Disgusting service
list_of_reviews.review: Disgusting service, high handed and unfriendly attitude. Because I took 2 hours to reply to their questions they imposed extra verification requirements. They have frozen my account with £1600 in it and I have no idea how to unfreeze it. I asked for help with the verification process but they said this is not a service they offer. It is impossible to actually speak to anyone there. Suggest this company is avoided at all costs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Funds Blocked and Unresponsive Support on OKX
list_of_reviews.review: For nearly a year, my funds have been unjustly blocked on OKX without any valid reason. Despite providing all the required documents for KYC verification, including an official bank statement with my full name, address, transaction history, and official stamps, my verification has been repeatedly rejected without specific explanations.I have spent countless hours trying to resolve this issue with OKX support, but my efforts have been in vain. My requests are met with automated responses, and the support team fails to provide any clear guidance or assistance. This lack of communication and transparency has led to severe personal and financial difficulties.It seems that my situation is not unique, as other users have reported similar experiences where their funds were suddenly blocked, and no documents were accepted. This raises serious concerns about the integrity and reliability of OKX as a platform.I am left with no choice but to warn others about the potential risks of using OKX. If you value your funds and want a platform that provides responsive and transparent support, I strongly advise considering other options.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Support okx - bad people

They said they would help, everything was fine, he provided all the screenshots of the address, hashes, everything that was needed.  4 days have passed, support does not respond, does not respond at all, even new tickets do not respond, deadlines were not specified, tokens never arrived, there is no connection with support, only the chat bot talks to me.  Disrespectful attitude towards clients, deception of clients!

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for okx.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common areas of concern include "manipulated prices," "withdrawal impossible," "verification long and finicky," "cheated me," and "extreme dissatisfaction." Praise focuses on "super support," "responsive service," "good user experience," and "lots of nice features."

prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 1.0, with all reviews rated 1. This indicates extremely low user satisfaction and widespread dissatisfaction, as evidenced by consistent negative feedback and severe issues highlighted in the reviews.

prompts_output.Output: Despite one positive review, the overwhelming majority of reviews rate the company extremely poorly (1.0 average), citing severe dissatisfaction, hidden charges, and accusations of scams.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews focus on TRON's growth, market performance, and industry insights, while negative reviews emphasize severe dissatisfaction with customer service, trustworthiness, manipulated prices, and withdrawal difficulties. The key differentiator is the contrast between perceived innovation and performance versus poor customer experiences and trust issues.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the okx.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Customer support at okx.com is praised for being reliable and responsive, as noted in positive reviews from March 2022 and July 2024. However, a May 2024 review criticizes the support team, indicating mixed experiences. Overall, support is generally effective but inconsistently perceived.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews of TRON reveal a stark contrast between positive perceptions of its market growth, performance, and industry insights, and overwhelmingly negative feedback regarding customer service and trustworthiness. Positive reviews commend TRON for its innovation and strong market presence, often citing growth metrics and industry events. However, negative reviews dominate, highlighting severe dissatisfaction with customer service, accusations of manipulated prices, and difficulties with withdrawals, leading to a perception of untrustworthiness. The critical issues identified include poor customer service, trust concerns, and operational transparency. To improve, TRON should focus on enhancing customer support, ensuring transparent and fair trading practices, and addressing trust issues to rebuild its reputation.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Disgusting service
list_of_reviews.review: Disgusting service, high handed and unfriendly attitude. Because I took 2 hours to reply to their questions they imposed extra verification requirements. list_of_reviews.review_title: I don't mean to sound impolite
list_of_reviews.review: I don't mean to sound impolite, but it would be best for you if you accepted that your money was lost as soon as possible. Like you, I was a victim and tried every solution available to me, including reaching out to customer service and seeking legal counsel, but all of it was in vain. After I started trading with Tomver, I was able to find happiness again because I had lost too much money to be content with them. questioned why they continue to operate.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Funds Blocked and Unresponsive Support on OKX
list_of_reviews.review: For nearly a year, my funds have been unjustly blocked on OKX without any valid reason. Despite providing all the required documents for KYC verification, including an official bank statement with my full name, address, transaction history, and official stamps, my verification has been repeatedly rejected without specific explanations.I have spent countless hours trying to resolve this issue with OKX support, but my efforts have been in vain. My requests are met with automated responses, and the support team fails to provide any clear guidance or assistance. This lack of communication and transparency has led to severe personal and financial difficulties.It seems that my situation is not unique, as other users have reported similar experiences where their funds were suddenly blocked, and no documents were accepted. This raises serious concerns about the integrity and reliability of OKX as a platform.I am left with no choice but to warn others about the potential risks of using OKX. If you value your funds and want a platform that provides responsive and transparent support, I strongly advise considering other options.

Summary: Users express significant dissatisfaction due to price manipulation, withdrawal issues, and verification difficulties, reflected in an average rating of 2. Negative reviews also touch on broader cryptocurrency market trends, indicating worries about reliability and market volatility. Key areas for potential improvement include addressing financial and operational concerns, such as enhancing transparency in pricing, streamlining the withdrawal and verification processes, and eliminating hidden charges. Further investigation could focus on understanding and mitigating the impact of market volatility on user trust and satisfaction.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Please be careful of this exchange
list_of_reviews.review: Please be careful of this exchange, 2 years they provided me great service.they got dust attacked end of June, without any notice my account got locked and 8000 usd are frozen. For 3 months they make me jump through hoops uploading identification video's. they go silent for 48 hours only to close the case via email.Last week it even got worse it looks like they turned of their live support, when asking to speak with an operator 3 times in a row, they change the language setting and put you back to where you started, fighting with an automated bot.In 3 months time not 1 department was able to explain what happened and if my funds are safe. INstead they bother with stupid questions such as, can you use your f2a? Did you share your password with anybody. Its incredible frustrating. My life savings seem to be gone. As a result of not being able to use MY OWN FCKN money for 3 months i got kicked out of my house with my family. I am as broke as possible.If anybody wants to help me out to get my life back on track this is my wallet :0x37e6f475ba6033ea6fDd641Fc0541Ce5a4a436aFI lost 8000 usd from my hard earned life savings.Please consider well before signing up to OKX they are registered at the Seychelle Islands which basically means Go F youself as a customer in case something goes wrong like the case with me.Stay safe people and do not deposit what you can't afford to lose over at OKX.Okx shame on you for treating people this way, shame on you for making money in such a dodgy way. You effect lives with this scammy behavior and take 0.0 accountability beyond your agents feeling very sorry for the delay and all the hussle.Okx i say stay away from it, do yourself a favor i am pissed of for real!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I was a client for years but kicked me out

list_of_reviews.review_title: Money taken by OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Complete newbie to crypto.  Deposited 50 into OKX wallet as test run from my trading account, requested withdrawal and all was well.  Then deposited 1850 into OKX wallet, this being my total trading funds.  Received email saying I had to complete further verification by proving money movement management.... I had to deposit £5k into OKX wallet, they would verify it then would release my frozen funds of 1850 and I could then withdraw my money.Replied to the email stating I didn't understand.  Almost immediate phone call from 'someone' saying basically if I don't deposit £5k by end of week (2 days away), I will lose my money.  She even suggested I consider taking out a loan to be able to fulfil the deposit request!I will not be giving them 5k and I know my crypto has been swallowed up by them.  Reading reviews on here, I can see I'm not the only one who has found funds frozen\disappeared.My very short venture into crypto is at an end and I wish I'd never got involved in the first place.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Very good exchange with lots of nice localised features
list_of_reviews.review: Good User Experience and lots of nice features. Especially good for new crypto users due to its toggle mode between beginner and advanced users. Very wide range of EUR-trading pairs and easy local payment on and off ramps.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Money taken by OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Complete newbie to crypto.  Deposited 50 into OKX wallet as test run from my trading account, requested withdrawal and all was well.  Then deposited 1850 into OKX wallet, this being my total trading funds.  Received email saying I had to complete further verification by proving money movement management.... I had to deposit £5k into OKX wallet, they would verify it then would release my frozen funds of 1850 and I could then withdraw my money.Replied to the email stating I didn't understand.  Almost immediate phone call from 'someone' saying basically if I don't deposit £5k by end of week (2 days away), I will lose my money.  She even suggested I consider taking out a loan to be able to fulfil the deposit request!I will not be giving them 5k and I know my crypto has been swallowed up by them.  Reading reviews on here, I can see I'm not the only one who has found funds frozen\disappeared.My very short venture into crypto is at an end and I wish I'd never got involved in the first place.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX just scammed me of my fund
list_of_reviews.review: OKX just scammed me of my fund. They asked me to verify my id which I did about 5 months ago. They asked me to do the same again which I did yesterday and all of a sudden they said they could not verify my ID and now they disable my account OKX account gone with all my fund. Beware, OKX is a total scam.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They have taken over 15% fees on my transaction!
list_of_reviews.review: I usually buy on Binance. This time I wanted to give a try to OKX. They have 3 payment options. I chose Simplex using my Mastercard Debit for £100. On the checkout page it showed that I will receive 133 USDT that will be then converted to 1.03 SOL. To my surprise I received 117 USDT => ALMOST 15% LESS THAN WHAT WAS ON THE CHECKOUT PAGE!I contacted both: OKX & Simplex Customer support. OKX - no help at all. Just a bot. Simplex - after 15 minutes wait time - they responded that their commissions are:Thank you for waiting. Our fees typically range from 3.5% to 5% of the total transaction value, with a minimum fee of $10 USD.​For your transaction of GBP 100.00, the following fees were applied:​Simplex Fee: GBP 4.00=> not communicated prior to the transaction (I wish I could attach a screenshot to this transaction because it was still showing 133 USDT on checkout)....but 133 USDT vs 117 USDT is 15% less than what I should have received.First experience & never again:No transparent fees until the transaction is done. 15% less than what I should have received.I'm glad I haven't tried them on any bigger transactions...

list_of_reviews.review_title: DO NOT ASSOCIATE WITH THIS COMPANY!!!
list_of_reviews.review: DO NOT ASSOCIATE WITH THIS COMPANY!!!THEY HAVE SCAMMED MY FATHER £7,000!!!THEY ARE WITHHOLDING HIS MONEY AND NO ONE IS HELPING US, THE WOMANS NAME IS MAYA!! He trusted her, spent many weeks on the phone with her setting up his accounts, wallets etc, now Maya/ OKx has wiped his account and theres no answer!!!Disgusting behaviour, my dad was cautious going into this but Maya spent hours and hours “helping” him and talking him through everything, however now its all set up he can’t access a single pound and theres radio silence on their end.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Money taken by OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Complete newbie to crypto.  Deposited 50 into OKX wallet as test run from my trading account, requested withdrawal and all was well.  Then deposited 1850 into OKX wallet, this being my total trading funds.  Received email saying I had to complete further verification by proving money movement management.... I had to deposit £5k into OKX wallet, they would verify it then would release my frozen funds of 1850 and I could then withdraw my money.Replied to the email stating I didn't understand.  Almost immediate phone call from 'someone' saying basically if I don't deposit £5k by end of week (2 days away), I will lose my money.  She even suggested I consider taking out a loan to be able to fulfil the deposit request!I will not be giving them 5k and I know my crypto has been swallowed up by them.  Reading reviews on here, I can see I'm not the only one who has found funds frozen\disappeared.My very short venture into crypto is at an end and I wish I'd never got involved in the first place.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX SCAMMED ME
list_of_reviews.review: I had an account yesterday that was open and able to be traded with and then today I try to get on and it says my account has been completed wiped. I tried verifying my ID with one of their agents through phone number, email, and finally my drivers license and none of them came up as an account. So my account is completely gone with everything in it and I can’t get it back. Do not trust would give 0 stars if possible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Misleading
list_of_reviews.review: They are very misleading they only platform that had been game changer to me very trustworthy and never disappoint thanks to metaBlue Llc

list_of_reviews.review_title: Just terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Just terrible. I live in a country I am not a citizen of, I asked a simple 'can I run an account with you?' they said yes, but their verification process does not allow for it. The Support is at best condescending and obtuse, at worst they are inept beyond belief. Opened and closed within two hours. Don't touch them with a very long, stinky stick. If I could give them zero stars I would.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Smart Sites / OKX exchange
list_of_reviews.review: I took part in Google hotel reviews and business tasks with Smart Sites. After making some profits, the amounts to invest increased rapidly.                                             In total, I invested Euro 4000,- with Smart Sites and now OKX wants me to pay crypto tax! Euro 2300,- over Euro 7660,- Straight up Scammers !

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst company ever!
list_of_reviews.review: Worst company ever!-100 starsThey turned off my active crypto without warning, cancelled all my trades and locked my bulk assets.Was worth thousands in USDT now only around 200USDT , also may other of my active trades got stopped and blocked.My total assets where worth around 5k USDT now less that 500USDTThey need to be made to pay everyone back and then shut down.I have been trying to fix this since Feb 2024

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trustable platform
list_of_reviews.review: Easy to use platform nice for expert traders but also for new crypto users.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX will do nothing if p2p frauds steal your money
list_of_reviews.review: I tried to buy usdt on the OKX exchange via p2p, but the seller, having received my transfer, refused to fulfill his part of the transaction. The exchange administration does nothing about this and allows this seller to trade despite the growing number of similar incidents with him. Moreover, I am sure that they hide most of the unsuccessful orders with this seller and do not cancel him despite their own rules. Order ID 240521175906152, the appeal has been under consideration since May 21...

list_of_reviews.review_title: They have taken over 15% fees on my transaction!
list_of_reviews.review: I usually buy on Binance. This time I wanted to give a try to OKX. They have 3 payment options. I chose Simplex using my Mastercard Debit for £100. On the checkout page it showed that I will receive 133 USDT that will be then converted to 1.03 SOL. To my surprise I received 117 USDT => ALMOST 15% LESS THAN WHAT WAS ON THE CHECKOUT PAGE!I contacted both: OKX & Simplex Customer support. OKX - no help at all. Just a bot. Simplex - after 15 minutes wait time - they responded that their commissions are:Thank you for waiting. Our fees typically range from 3.5% to 5% of the total transaction value, with a minimum fee of $10 USD.​For your transaction of GBP 100.00, the following fees were applied:​Simplex Fee: GBP 4.00=> not communicated prior to the transaction (I wish I could attach a screenshot to this transaction because it was still showing 133 USDT on checkout)....but 133 USDT vs 117 USDT is 15% less than what I should have received.First experience & never again:No transparent fees until the transaction is done. 15% less than what I should have received.I'm glad I haven't tried them on any bigger transactions...

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is an exchange of fraudsters
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is an exchange of fraudsters. Deposits of large amount will not be credited into your account. Customer care will not respond to emails dancing for payment of your coin/crypto.Insensitive to clients feeling, lacks empathy

list_of_reviews.review_title: They won't allow me to send crypto to…
list_of_reviews.review: They won't allow me to send crypto to my external wallet outside of OKX. Safety reasons... yeah right... You lost another client today. Very unprofessional attitude towards it's clients.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I'm not sure why many people are giving…
list_of_reviews.review: I'm not sure why many people are giving negative reviews on OKX , For me it's better than Binance, actually, it's the best platform when it comes to P2P support , quick and fair enough for both sides . I got scammed once, but it was my fault and they couldn't help it. So, i don't blame them , try BYBIT to see the difference in CS that can take weeks to respond if they ever respond leaving you and your loss alone . As a super merchant for almost a year and a regular customer for two years , I'm satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX - stay away
list_of_reviews.review: OKX did not rewarded the full sign up bonus. Customer service is terrible. CS is just stalling, not responding to the actual matter and even saying contradicting things on one day. There are way better exchanges. Stay away of OKX

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trading from 2018 here and always super experience
list_of_reviews.review: Trading here from 2018 and what can I tell you: good user experience... no... best user experience. I added few proposals and they implemented. It super important. Good products: you can trade on spot or with bots, for me these two products are the best. And of course Earn. Just, explore and you will face with good community, fast and smart CS, best products in industry. And also look for promo campaigns, sometimes they are super interesting!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Very good exchange with lots of nice localised features
list_of_reviews.review: Good User Experience and lots of nice features. Especially good for new crypto users due to its toggle mode between beginner and advanced users. Very wide range of EUR-trading pairs and easy local payment on and off ramps.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I was a client for years but kicked me out
list_of_reviews.review: I was a client for years, and I bought, sold, and exchanged crypto on their platform. But suddenly, they froze my account, and their fraudulent department contacted me. They asked me for a lot of information, and I explained everything and gave them everything I knew. But then, without any reply, they closed my account. I was not allowed to ask them a question. So watch-out working with them!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trading fine, support afwul
list_of_reviews.review: The trading functionality is fine. However, support is incompetent in resolving basic concerns or working with humans. E.g. providing the publicly available official company address and CEO name to submit an official notice, nor ticket ID or where to get the most obvious data.I addressed my concerns via a chat, chat ID: 6098788.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do not trade using OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trade using OKX. They try to lure you in with 'fun' campaigns, but refuse to reward you even though you have completed all the requirements. Their customer service is hard to get in touch with, and are also incapable of reviewing information. They will incorporate 'a failsafe' in their terms and conditions on which they can fall back when you are in the right. Do not trade with them and/or withdraw all your funds you may have with them!Their reply states that they're there to help and to hear my concerns, but this has never happened on their support email. They keep resending the same replies, without reading what was said.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX you require a verification
list_of_reviews.review: OKX you require a verification, sent you a mail from my bank dated mth of August 2024. Was rejected.Did another verification attempt with a utility bill dated month od September 2024 again rejected. Both reasons from you are that My address information is not correct. I have only 1 (ONE) residential address. your chat support cant even wait a lill over 3 mins, even tho ive told her to pls hold while i get the doc that i sent. My address on the utility bill and bank notice are very clear. Perhaps yall need to visit an optician. And not be ambiguous about what the problem is. Totally frustrating experience,Date of experience: September 20, 2024

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is the worst crypto exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is the worst crypto exchange experience of my life. Nothing works on this platform. I tried to verify my profile, and their faulty 'AI' system recorded the wrong ID number. There was no way for me to edit this ID so I reached out to their "support". Their support team wanted me to send them my ID and personal picture over email instead of fixing the issue on the platform! This is a clear security concern and a direct violation of EU GDPR laws, and they insisted that this is what I needed to do. Of course, I rejected this and closed my account. PS: I'm the CMO at a personal finance site with over 6 million monthly sessions. I will make sure that all of our readers understand what a horrible company OKX is.

list_of_reviews.review_title: "BEWARE: OKX Scammed Me Out of $580 - AVOID THIS EXCHANGE"
list_of_reviews.review: I'm writing this review as a warning to others: STAY AWAY FROM OKX! They scammed me out of $580 and have provided absolutely no help or resolution.I mistakenly sent funds to the exchange and reached out to their support team to lift the restriction on my account. However, the representative (who claimed to be assisting me) completely ignored my requests and failed to resolve the issue.It's been THREE DAYS with NO FEEDBACK, NO ACTION, and NO REFUND. Their lack of transparency and accountability is appalling.OKX's inaction and disregard for customers' funds are clear signs of a scam. I urge everyone to avoid this exchange and take their business (and money) elsewhere.- Poor customer support- Unresponsive team- Scammed me out of $580- No transparency or accountability- Restrictive account policies*VERDICT:* OKX is a fraudulent exchange that prioritizes scamming customers over providing legitimate services. Protect your funds and avoid this platform at all costs.

He trusted her, spent many weeks on the phone with her setting up his accounts, wallets etc, now Maya/ OKx has wiped his account and theres no answer!!!Disgusting behaviour, my dad was cautious going into this but Maya spent hours and hours “helping” him and talking him through everything, however now its all set up he can’t access a single pound and theres radio silence on their end.

Just, explore and you will face with good community, fast and smart CS, best products in industry. And also look for promo campaigns, sometimes they are super interesting!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Customer support is awful
list_of_reviews.review: Customer support is awful. Issues with withdrawal were not addressed, I had to reach and file a report against them with a serious firm. Look at display picture, everything is now resolved.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trading fine, support afwul
