E.g. providing the publicly available official company address and CEO name to submit an official notice, nor ticket ID or where to get the most obvious data.I addressed my concerns via a chat, chat ID: 6098788.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Easy and understandable interface with…
list_of_reviews.review: Easy and understandable interface with high level of security check before any transactions can be executed. Okx is matured in monetary dealings.

list_of_reviews.review_title: "BEWARE: OKX Scammed Me Out of $580 - AVOID THIS EXCHANGE"
list_of_reviews.review: I'm writing this review as a warning to others: STAY AWAY FROM OKX! They scammed me out of $580 and have provided absolutely no help or resolution.I mistakenly sent funds to the exchange and reached out to their support team to lift the restriction on my account. However, the representative (who claimed to be assisting me) completely ignored my requests and failed to resolve the issue.It's been THREE DAYS with NO FEEDBACK, NO ACTION, and NO REFUND. Their lack of transparency and accountability is appalling.OKX's inaction and disregard for customers' funds are clear signs of a scam. I urge everyone to avoid this exchange and take their business (and money) elsewhere.- Poor customer support- Unresponsive team- Scammed me out of $580- No transparency or accountability- Restrictive account policies*VERDICT:* OKX is a fraudulent exchange that prioritizes scamming customers over providing legitimate services. Protect your funds and avoid this platform at all costs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do not trade using OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trade using OKX. They try to lure you in with 'fun' campaigns, but refuse to reward you even though you have completed all the requirements. Their customer service is hard to get in touch with, and are also incapable of reviewing information. They will incorporate 'a failsafe' in their terms and conditions on which they can fall back when you are in the right. Do not trade with them and/or withdraw all your funds you may have with them!Their reply states that they're there to help and to hear my concerns, but this has never happened on their support email. They keep resending the same replies, without reading what was said.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX you require a verification
list_of_reviews.review: OKX you require a verification, sent you a mail from my bank dated mth of August 2024. Was rejected.Did another verification attempt with a utility bill dated month od September 2024 again rejected. Both reasons from you are that My address information is not correct. I have only 1 (ONE) residential address. your chat support cant even wait a lill over 3 mins, even tho ive told her to pls hold while i get the doc that i sent. My address on the utility bill and bank notice are very clear. Perhaps yall need to visit an optician. And not be ambiguous about what the problem is. Totally frustrating experience,Date of experience: September 20, 2024

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is the worst crypto exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is the worst crypto exchange experience of my life. Nothing works on this platform. I tried to verify my profile, and their faulty 'AI' system recorded the wrong ID number. There was no way for me to edit this ID so I reached out to their "support". Their support team wanted me to send them my ID and personal picture over email instead of fixing the issue on the platform! This is a clear security concern and a direct violation of EU GDPR laws, and they insisted that this is what I needed to do. Of course, I rejected this and closed my account. PS: I'm the CMO at a personal finance site with over 6 million monthly sessions. I will make sure that all of our readers understand what a horrible company OKX is.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX SCAMMED ME
list_of_reviews.review: I had an account yesterday that was open and able to be traded with and then today I try to get on and it says my account has been completed wiped. I tried verifying my ID with one of their agents through phone number, email, and finally my drivers license and none of them came up as an account. So my account is completely gone with everything in it and I can’t get it back. Do not trust would give 0 stars if possible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Misleading
list_of_reviews.review: They are very misleading they only platform that had been game changer to me very trustworthy and never disappoint thanks to metaBlue Llc

list_of_reviews.review_title: Just terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Just terrible. I live in a country I am not a citizen of, I asked a simple 'can I run an account with you?' they said yes, but their verification process does not allow for it. The Support is at best condescending and obtuse, at worst they are inept beyond belief. Opened and closed within two hours. Don't touch them with a very long, stinky stick. If I could give them zero stars I would.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst company ever!
list_of_reviews.review: Worst company ever!-100 starsThey turned off my active crypto without warning, cancelled all my trades and locked my bulk assets.Was worth thousands in USDT now only around 200USDT , also may other of my active trades got stopped and blocked.My total assets where worth around 5k USDT now less that 500USDTThey need to be made to pay everyone back and then shut down.I have been trying to fix this since Feb 2024

list_of_reviews.review_title: Smart Sites / OKX exchange
list_of_reviews.review: I took part in Google hotel reviews and business tasks with Smart Sites. After making some profits, the amounts to invest increased rapidly.                                             In total, I invested Euro 4000,- with Smart Sites and now OKX wants me to pay crypto tax! Euro 2300,- over Euro 7660,- Straight up Scammers !

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX will do nothing if p2p frauds steal your money
list_of_reviews.review: I tried to buy usdt on the OKX exchange via p2p, but the seller, having received my transfer, refused to fulfill his part of the transaction. The exchange administration does nothing about this and allows this seller to trade despite the growing number of similar incidents with him. Moreover, I am sure that they hide most of the unsuccessful orders with this seller and do not cancel him despite their own rules. Order ID 240521175906152, the appeal has been under consideration since May 21...

list_of_reviews.review_title: They have taken over 15% fees on my transaction!
list_of_reviews.review: I usually buy on Binance. This time I wanted to give a try to OKX. They have 3 payment options. I chose Simplex using my Mastercard Debit for £100. On the checkout page it showed that I will receive 133 USDT that will be then converted to 1.03 SOL. To my surprise I received 117 USDT => ALMOST 15% LESS THAN WHAT WAS ON THE CHECKOUT PAGE!I contacted both: OKX & Simplex Customer support. OKX - no help at all. Just a bot. Simplex - after 15 minutes wait time - they responded that their commissions are:Thank you for waiting. Our fees typically range from 3.5% to 5% of the total transaction value, with a minimum fee of $10 USD.​For your transaction of GBP 100.00, the following fees were applied:​Simplex Fee: GBP 4.00=> not communicated prior to the transaction (I wish I could attach a screenshot to this transaction because it was still showing 133 USDT on checkout)....but 133 USDT vs 117 USDT is 15% less than what I should have received.First experience & never again:No transparent fees until the transaction is done. 15% less than what I should have received.I'm glad I haven't tried them on any bigger transactions...

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is an exchange of fraudsters
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is an exchange of fraudsters. Deposits of large amount will not be credited into your account. Customer care will not respond to emails dancing for payment of your coin/crypto.Insensitive to clients feeling, lacks empathy

list_of_reviews.review_title: They won't allow me to send crypto to…
list_of_reviews.review: They won't allow me to send crypto to my external wallet outside of OKX. Safety reasons... yeah right... You lost another client today. Very unprofessional attitude towards it's clients.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I'm not sure why many people are giving…
list_of_reviews.review: I'm not sure why many people are giving negative reviews on OKX , For me it's better than Binance, actually, it's the best platform when it comes to P2P support , quick and fair enough for both sides . I got scammed once, but it was my fault and they couldn't help it. So, i don't blame them , try BYBIT to see the difference in CS that can take weeks to respond if they ever respond leaving you and your loss alone . As a super merchant for almost a year and a regular customer for two years , I'm satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX - stay away
list_of_reviews.review: OKX did not rewarded the full sign up bonus. Customer service is terrible. CS is just stalling, not responding to the actual matter and even saying contradicting things on one day. There are way better exchanges. Stay away of OKX

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trustable platform
list_of_reviews.review: Easy to use platform nice for expert traders but also for new crypto users.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My case was lost, deleted and unfulfilled refund
list_of_reviews.review: More than a week ago I made a transfer from the USDT/TON network to Okx on Binance. I was told there would be a refund due to missing memo information. For 1 week there has been no refund, what I have experienced in this process;- I created a direct support request, I was told that a refund would be made.- They constantly respond to support requests automatically and robotically.- They constantly respond to live support requests automatically and robotically.- Their only answer is “we are interested, we forwarded it to the team, don't worry, we understand you.THE BEGINNING OF THE BIG PROBLEM AND SUSPICION;My support request disappeared or was deleted. My case about the return process in the Okx support center has completely disappeared. When I ask for information via live support, they reply “your ticket is open, don't worry”. I am now looking for an ulterior motive and I think I am being scammed.It has been an absolutely terrible experience, I have been in contact with many different crypto exchanges. I have never had such a bad experience as this one. The support service is poor, not lacking. NO SUPPORT SERVICE!Now they will write an automatic reply under this message and again there will be no solution.My lost case number: 6104666

They scammed me out of $580 and have provided absolutely no help or resolution.I mistakenly sent funds to the exchange and reached out to their support team to lift the restriction on my account. However, the representative (who claimed to be assisting me) completely ignored my requests and failed to resolve the issue.It's been THREE DAYS with NO FEEDBACK, NO ACTION, and NO REFUND. Their lack of transparency and accountability is appalling.OKX's inaction and disregard for customers' funds are clear signs of a scam. I urge everyone to avoid this exchange and take their business (and money) elsewhere.- Poor customer support- Unresponsive team- Scammed me out of $580- No transparency or accountability- Restrictive account policies*VERDICT:* OKX is a fraudulent exchange that prioritizes scamming customers over providing legitimate services. Protect your funds and avoid this platform at all costs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Easy and understandable interface with…
list_of_reviews.review: Easy and understandable interface with high level of security check before any transactions can be executed. Okx is matured in monetary dealings.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX you require a verification
list_of_reviews.review: OKX you require a verification, sent you a mail from my bank dated mth of August 2024. Was rejected.Did another verification attempt with a utility bill dated month od September 2024 again rejected. Both reasons from you are that My address information is not correct. I have only 1 (ONE) residential address. your chat support cant even wait a lill over 3 mins, even tho ive told her to pls hold while i get the doc that i sent. My address on the utility bill and bank notice are very clear. Perhaps yall need to visit an optician. And not be ambiguous about what the problem is. Totally frustrating experience,Date of experience: September 20, 2024

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is the worst crypto exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is the worst crypto exchange experience of my life. Nothing works on this platform. I tried to verify my profile, and their faulty 'AI' system recorded the wrong ID number. There was no way for me to edit this ID so I reached out to their "support". Their support team wanted me to send them my ID and personal picture over email instead of fixing the issue on the platform! This is a clear security concern and a direct violation of EU GDPR laws, and they insisted that this is what I needed to do. Of course, I rejected this and closed my account. PS: I'm the CMO at a personal finance site with over 6 million monthly sessions. I will make sure that all of our readers understand what a horrible company OKX is.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Just terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Just terrible. I live in a country I am not a citizen of, I asked a simple 'can I run an account with you?' they said yes, but their verification process does not allow for it. The Support is at best condescending and obtuse, at worst they are inept beyond belief. Opened and closed within two hours. Don't touch them with a very long, stinky stick. If I could give them zero stars I would.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst company ever!
list_of_reviews.review: Worst company ever!-100 starsThey turned off my active crypto without warning, cancelled all my trades and locked my bulk assets.Was worth thousands in USDT now only around 200USDT , also may other of my active trades got stopped and blocked.My total assets where worth around 5k USDT now less that 500USDTThey need to be made to pay everyone back and then shut down.I have been trying to fix this since Feb 2024

list_of_reviews.review_title: Smart Sites / OKX exchange
list_of_reviews.review: I took part in Google hotel reviews and business tasks with Smart Sites. After making some profits, the amounts to invest increased rapidly.                                             In total, I invested Euro 4000,- with Smart Sites and now OKX wants me to pay crypto tax! Euro 2300,- over Euro 7660,- Straight up Scammers !

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX will do nothing if p2p frauds steal your money
list_of_reviews.review: I tried to buy usdt on the OKX exchange via p2p, but the seller, having received my transfer, refused to fulfill his part of the transaction. The exchange administration does nothing about this and allows this seller to trade despite the growing number of similar incidents with him. Moreover, I am sure that they hide most of the unsuccessful orders with this seller and do not cancel him despite their own rules. Order ID 240521175906152, the appeal has been under consideration since May 21...

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is an exchange of fraudsters
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is an exchange of fraudsters. Deposits of large amount will not be credited into your account. Customer care will not respond to emails dancing for payment of your coin/crypto.Insensitive to clients feeling, lacks empathy

list_of_reviews.review_title: They have taken over 15% fees on my transaction!
list_of_reviews.review: I usually buy on Binance. This time I wanted to give a try to OKX. They have 3 payment options. I chose Simplex using my Mastercard Debit for £100. On the checkout page it showed that I will receive 133 USDT that will be then converted to 1.03 SOL. To my surprise I received 117 USDT => ALMOST 15% LESS THAN WHAT WAS ON THE CHECKOUT PAGE!I contacted both: OKX & Simplex Customer support. OKX - no help at all. Just a bot. Simplex - after 15 minutes wait time - they responded that their commissions are:Thank you for waiting. Our fees typically range from 3.5% to 5% of the total transaction value, with a minimum fee of $10 USD.​For your transaction of GBP 100.00, the following fees were applied:​Simplex Fee: GBP 4.00=> not communicated prior to the transaction (I wish I could attach a screenshot to this transaction because it was still showing 133 USDT on checkout)....but 133 USDT vs 117 USDT is 15% less than what I should have received.First experience & never again:No transparent fees until the transaction is done. 15% less than what I should have received.I'm glad I haven't tried them on any bigger transactions...

list_of_reviews.review_title: They won't allow me to send crypto to…
list_of_reviews.review: They won't allow me to send crypto to my external wallet outside of OKX. Safety reasons... yeah right... You lost another client today. Very unprofessional attitude towards it's clients.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I'm not sure why many people are giving…
list_of_reviews.review: I'm not sure why many people are giving negative reviews on OKX , For me it's better than Binance, actually, it's the best platform when it comes to P2P support , quick and fair enough for both sides . I got scammed once, but it was my fault and they couldn't help it. So, i don't blame them , try BYBIT to see the difference in CS that can take weeks to respond if they ever respond leaving you and your loss alone . As a super merchant for almost a year and a regular customer for two years , I'm satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX - stay away
list_of_reviews.review: OKX did not rewarded the full sign up bonus. Customer service is terrible. CS is just stalling, not responding to the actual matter and even saying contradicting things on one day. There are way better exchanges. Stay away of OKX

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trading from 2018 here and always super experience
list_of_reviews.review: Trading here from 2018 and what can I tell you: good user experience... no... best user experience. I added few proposals and they implemented. It super important. Good products: you can trade on spot or with bots, for me these two products are the best. And of course Earn. Just, explore and you will face with good community, fast and smart CS, best products in industry. And also look for promo campaigns, sometimes they are super interesting!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Very good exchange with lots of nice localised features
list_of_reviews.review: Good User Experience and lots of nice features. Especially good for new crypto users due to its toggle mode between beginner and advanced users. Very wide range of EUR-trading pairs and easy local payment on and off ramps.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for okx.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common areas of praise for okx.com include "security," "robustness," "speed," "easy to use," and "quick transactions." Concerns often mention "unresponsive customer support" and "high commissions for non-regular traders," highlighting issues with service efficiency and cost.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 4.33, based on four 5-star and one 1-star reviews. This suggests high user satisfaction with technological advancements and integrations, but notable dissatisfaction with customer support, as reflected in the single 1-star review.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The product has a 4.33 average rating from four 5-star and one 1-star reviews, indicating high satisfaction with its technological features and integrations, but significant dissatisfaction with customer support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews emphasize technological advancements, ecosystem updates, and integrations, highlighting innovation and community engagement. Negative reviews focus on unmet expectations and service inefficiencies, particularly unresponsive customer support, contrasting satisfaction with innovation against frustration with service.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the okx.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The provided context does not include specific reviews or mentions of OKX.com's customer support interactions, so I cannot gauge their effectiveness and responsiveness.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews highlight a strong emphasis on technological advancements, ecosystem updates, and integrations, showcasing innovation and community engagement as key strengths. Positive feedback underscores the value of these innovations and the active involvement of the community. However, negative reviews point to unmet expectations and service inefficiencies, particularly highlighting issues with unresponsive customer support. This contrast suggests a gap between the technological progress and the quality of customer service, indicating a need for improvement in support responsiveness. To enhance overall user satisfaction, it would be beneficial to investigate and address these service inefficiencies while maintaining the momentum in technological and community-driven advancements.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account is frozen since several…
list_of_reviews.review: My account is frozen since several month. My fund is in the account. They neither transfer the fund to the provided crypto address nor reinstate the account. keep away from this fraud app and look for alternative!My case id: 6081393

list_of_reviews.review_title: Lost Money Due to Poor Service – Be Cautious
list_of_reviews.review: OKX scammed me out of my money with delays and zero customer support. It’s been a nightmare. I’ve since turned to InvestorAlliance L.L.C., which offers a secure, reliable platform with real support. If you value your investments, it’s worth looking into better alternatives.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I received an email that T&C is being…
list_of_reviews.review: I received an email that T&C is being updated, BUT WEIRDLY: I did not even signed up. I quickly tried signing in, forgot password and CLOSE ACCOUNT. I think this is being used now by the scammers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Couldn't sell my BTC
list_of_reviews.review: Unfortunately I have to write a short, negative, review about my experience with OKX Europe.I was unable to sell my BTC when the price was high. I was only able to sell it with a loss / when the price was lower. Feels like a scam. I have taken away all my money because this feels like there is some manipulation going on.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Trading fine, support afwul
list_of_reviews.review: The trading functionality is fine. However, support is incompetent in resolving basic concerns or working with humans. E.g. providing the publicly available official company address and CEO name to submit an official notice, nor ticket ID or where to get the most obvious data.I addressed my concerns via a chat, chat ID: 6098788.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Customer support is awful
list_of_reviews.review: Customer support is awful. Issues with withdrawal were not addressed, I had to reach and file a report against them with a serious firm. Look at display picture, everything is now resolved.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do not trade using OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trade using OKX. They try to lure you in with 'fun' campaigns, but refuse to reward you even though you have completed all the requirements. Their customer service is hard to get in touch with, and are also incapable of reviewing information. They will incorporate 'a failsafe' in their terms and conditions on which they can fall back when you are in the right. Do not trade with them and/or withdraw all your funds you may have with them!Their reply states that they're there to help and to hear my concerns, but this has never happened on their support email. They keep resending the same replies, without reading what was said.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They will suspend your account be cautions…
list_of_reviews.review: I verified my account and started using their platform. Received an airdrop and started trading then after one month all of a sudden they asked me to provide my source of income. The tokens which I received is by using their provided wallet address and meme so I told the customer support everything and send the screenshot but they don't care all they wanted was to suspend my account and they did it. If you are in crypto trading just use Binance they won't bother you.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Your money is not safe the exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: Your money is not safe the exchange gets hacked all the time, just google "okx hack" and see for yourself, they suspended my account and wanted a list of ridiculous things.this is a summary of the story if you are stupid enough to give them your personnel details you deserve to lose your money: On Monday, June 10, OKX experienced significant outflows of $204 million in the past 24 hours and $633 million over the past week, according to DeFi Llama. This follows reports of a coordinated hack that targeted two OKX users, bypassing the platform’s security measures.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Okex🚩🚩I requested my account to…
list_of_reviews.review: Avoid Okex🚩🚩I requested my account to be freezed because I lost email. The account was freezed very fast ✅, That was in the year 2022 , Now I wanted to unfreeze it and use new email address. I contacted support on app gave me case I'd and told me to follow by emails, it is 2 years now going back and forth from app to email, I provided my Id , selfie, videos I even requested live video call to reopen my account but no success. This might be a scam exchange unlike Binance. Recent ticket number 6173548. Always failing me , is there any way I can havé back my account? Or just leave it guys?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Withdrawal Returned by Binance but OKX is not returning my amount.
list_of_reviews.review: I had a withdrawal of 28 USDT to send it to my friend through TON Network, but unfortunately I missed to write a memo code and my friend complained to his exchange (Binance), they returned the amount in 3 days to my OKX account but it didn't arrive to my OKX and OKX is keep asking me for proofs, I have provided all the details and proofs through videos and pictures, which they wanted to return my amount but they keep telling me things just like I am talking to some robot. Please help me getting out of this mess and please don't suggest to complain on OKX support this is useless. Its been almost a month but my OKX support is useless and unable to send me my small amount back.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They blocked my account without reason
list_of_reviews.review: They blocked my account without reason, without explanation. They just told me that it does not comply with the ToC. I read each of the points carefully and it is impossible that I have violated any term.

I was only able to sell it with a loss / when the price was lower. Feels like a scam. I have taken away all my money because this feels like there is some manipulation going on.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Customer support is awful

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX you require a verification
list_of_reviews.review: OKX you require a verification, sent you a mail from my bank dated mth of August 2024. Was rejected.Did another verification attempt with a utility bill dated month od September 2024 again rejected. Both reasons from you are that My address information is not correct. I have only 1 (ONE) residential address. your chat support cant even wait a lill over 3 mins, even tho ive told her to pls hold while i get the doc that i sent. My address on the utility bill and bank notice are very clear. Perhaps yall need to visit an optician. And not be ambiguous about what the problem is. Totally frustrating experience,Date of experience: September 20, 2024

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do not trade using OKX
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trade using OKX. They try to lure you in with 'fun' campaigns, but refuse to reward you even though you have completed all the requirements. Their customer service is hard to get in touch with, and are also incapable of reviewing information. They will incorporate 'a failsafe' in their terms and conditions on which they can fall back when you are in the right. Do not trade with them and/or withdraw all your funds you may have with them!Their reply states that they're there to help and to hear my concerns, but this has never happened on their support email. They keep resending the same replies, without reading what was said.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Easy and understandable interface with…
list_of_reviews.review: Easy and understandable interface with high level of security check before any transactions can be executed. Okx is matured in monetary dealings.

list_of_reviews.review_title: "BEWARE: OKX Scammed Me Out of $580 - AVOID THIS EXCHANGE"
list_of_reviews.review: I'm writing this review as a warning to others: STAY AWAY FROM OKX! They scammed me out of $580 and have provided absolutely no help or resolution.I mistakenly sent funds to the exchange and reached out to their support team to lift the restriction on my account. However, the representative (who claimed to be assisting me) completely ignored my requests and failed to resolve the issue.It's been THREE DAYS with NO FEEDBACK, NO ACTION, and NO REFUND. Their lack of transparency and accountability is appalling.OKX's inaction and disregard for customers' funds are clear signs of a scam. I urge everyone to avoid this exchange and take their business (and money) elsewhere.- Poor customer support- Unresponsive team- Scammed me out of $580- No transparency or accountability- Restrictive account policies*VERDICT:* OKX is a fraudulent exchange that prioritizes scamming customers over providing legitimate services. Protect your funds and avoid this platform at all costs.

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX is the worst crypto exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: OKX is the worst crypto exchange experience of my life. Nothing works on this platform. I tried to verify my profile, and their faulty 'AI' system recorded the wrong ID number. There was no way for me to edit this ID so I reached out to their "support". Their support team wanted me to send them my ID and personal picture over email instead of fixing the issue on the platform! This is a clear security concern and a direct violation of EU GDPR laws, and they insisted that this is what I needed to do. Of course, I rejected this and closed my account. PS: I'm the CMO at a personal finance site with over 6 million monthly sessions. I will make sure that all of our readers understand what a horrible company OKX is.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I'm not sure why many people are giving…
list_of_reviews.review: I'm not sure why many people are giving negative reviews on OKX , For me it's better than Binance, actually, it's the best platform when it comes to P2P support , quick and fair enough for both sides . I got scammed once, but it was my fault and they couldn't help it. So, i don't blame them , try BYBIT to see the difference in CS that can take weeks to respond if they ever respond leaving you and your loss alone . As a super merchant for almost a year and a regular customer for two years , I'm satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Just terrible
list_of_reviews.review: Just terrible. I live in a country I am not a citizen of, I asked a simple 'can I run an account with you?' they said yes, but their verification process does not allow for it. The Support is at best condescending and obtuse, at worst they are inept beyond belief. Opened and closed within two hours. Don't touch them with a very long, stinky stick. If I could give them zero stars I would.

I recon there is nothing you can do to recuperate or prevent this scam for other people, if there is, please let me know. I talked to a lawyer, who told me that bolbooll "earned" 100 million.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Works very well indeed
list_of_reviews.review: Works very well indeed, but i saw that you can hack the system with the Developer tool of google to see other clients

list_of_reviews.review_title: They sell your number to other parties
list_of_reviews.review: They sell your number to other parties, who keep calling you incessantly, as mentioned in previous reviews. Although I've made an effort to block each number, they continue to call from different numbers. Easy to invest, but difficult to cash out on the platform. You keep ignoring my questions. To find a solution at this time, I would suggest choosing Futurewise.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Refusal to return profits
list_of_reviews.review: On the 20th of August OKX asked me to deposit £5,000 to Blockchain in order to release my funds. After depositing the money I was informed that all the money would be in my account within 2 hours. I still don't have the money and can't get a reply via the telephone and any emails just come back saying "not known ". I was using a "reputable " financial adviser, Ryan O'connell to trade on my behalf and my case worker is Alex Bell. I am currently going through the Financial Ombudsman and think we will probably have to take it to court.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They are scammers hold my 1300 usd…
list_of_reviews.review: They are scammers hold my 1300 usd without any reason and even not telling any thing I lost my email they not want any verification only need my email back for contact total fruad

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried to get my UID number
list_of_reviews.review: Tried to get my UID number, impossible to find unlike Bybit and others where it is clearly visible. Spent 1 hour searching and trying what must be the dumbest bot I have ever come accross. I still do not know my UID number. Uninstalled app after reading all the stories here of frozen accounts

list_of_reviews.review_title: AML check
list_of_reviews.review: I have gone through an AML check and OKX have taken £10k of my money and said that my bank had blocked the payment back, they said "This may occur due to problems when depositing the funds for AML such as bank blocks, card blocks, etc. which have red-flagged the system and are preventing us from automatically withdrawing your funds for security reasons." this seems like a big scam

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account was banned overnight
list_of_reviews.review: My account was banned overnight, I believe it had over 50,000 USDT on it, and all they say is that it was frozen for a suspicious transaction. But I only used it for storage and nothing else. The answer is always believing I violated the OKX 7.8 policy and will never get it back. AVOID USING THE APP BECAUSE IF YOU HAVE MONEY IN IT YOU WILL BE BANNED

list_of_reviews.review_title: Your money is not safe the exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: Your money is not safe the exchange gets hacked all the time, just google "okx hack" and see for yourself, they suspended my account and wanted a list of ridiculous things.this is a summary of the story if you are stupid enough to give them your personnel details you deserve to lose your money: On Monday, June 10, OKX experienced significant outflows of $204 million in the past 24 hours and $633 million over the past week, according to DeFi Llama. This follows reports of a coordinated hack that targeted two OKX users, bypassing the platform’s security measures.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They will suspend your account be cautions…
list_of_reviews.review: I verified my account and started using their platform. Received an airdrop and started trading then after one month all of a sudden they asked me to provide my source of income. The tokens which I received is by using their provided wallet address and meme so I told the customer support everything and send the screenshot but they don't care all they wanted was to suspend my account and they did it. If you are in crypto trading just use Binance they won't bother you.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Okex🚩🚩I requested my account to…
list_of_reviews.review: Avoid Okex🚩🚩I requested my account to be freezed because I lost email. The account was freezed very fast ✅, That was in the year 2022 , Now I wanted to unfreeze it and use new email address. I contacted support on app gave me case I'd and told me to follow by emails, it is 2 years now going back and forth from app to email, I provided my Id , selfie, videos I even requested live video call to reopen my account but no success. This might be a scam exchange unlike Binance. Recent ticket number 6173548. Always failing me , is there any way I can havé back my account? Or just leave it guys?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Withdrawal Returned by Binance but OKX is not returning my amount.
list_of_reviews.review: I had a withdrawal of 28 USDT to send it to my friend through TON Network, but unfortunately I missed to write a memo code and my friend complained to his exchange (Binance), they returned the amount in 3 days to my OKX account but it didn't arrive to my OKX and OKX is keep asking me for proofs, I have provided all the details and proofs through videos and pictures, which they wanted to return my amount but they keep telling me things just like I am talking to some robot. Please help me getting out of this mess and please don't suggest to complain on OKX support this is useless. Its been almost a month but my OKX support is useless and unable to send me my small amount back. Ticket Number is 6150416.

prompts_output.Output: With only one review rated 1, the average rating is 1. Without additional reviews, it's impossible to analyze the distribution or determine general user satisfaction.

prompts_output.Output: The review expresses concerns about trustworthiness and potential financial schemes, despite noting reliability and good customer support. With only one negative review rated 1, overall user satisfaction remains unclear.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews often highlight secure investments, democratized access, and innovative partnerships, while negative reviews focus on regulatory uncertainty and inconsistent returns. Key differentiators are the perceived stability and accessibility of offerings versus concerns over market regulation and financial performance.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the okx.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The reviews indicate mixed experiences with OKX customer support: one praises efficient service, while another criticizes support's incompetence in handling basic concerns, suggesting inconsistency in effectiveness and responsiveness.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews highlight a mix of praise and concerns, with key themes including reliability, trustworthiness, and customer support. Positive feedback emphasizes the platform's reliability and effective customer support, with issues being resolved satisfactorily. However, there are significant concerns about trustworthiness, with phrases like "not trustworthy" and "Ponzi tactics" suggesting potential financial risks and the need for users to conduct their own research (DYOR). The presence of only one review rated 1 limits the ability to gauge overall user satisfaction or identify a broader pattern in user experiences. To improve, the platform should address trust issues transparently and encourage more user feedback to provide a clearer picture of user satisfaction and areas needing enhancement.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Impossible to close position
list_of_reviews.review: I am currently in a short position while writing this review. I had a stop set at 14% profit, and the price hit that level. However, OKX canceled the stop order. As the price continued to drop, I tried to close my position and reached out to them for assistance. The price is now 4% in loss, and despite my efforts to close, they’ve only responded with generic instructions like 'click the button.' I’ve sent 14 different screenshots showing that I am unable to close the position, yet they haven't provided a solution, and I continue to lose money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: worst platform ever,scammers P2P
list_of_reviews.review: worst platform ever,P2P  plenty of scammers who re encouraged by the poor service and support and the worst process  i refer u to my order 241023063701398 , my assets 2000 $ have been blocked for 14 hours and i talked to 5 support agents no one could help , i wasted hours and hours talking , no one helped each p2P trasbaction is a hell , because scammers are trying to benifit from the poor process of okx , a scammer is not requird to provide anything, he can create an account in 1 minute and place big order to block all ur assets and say that he paid and dissapear  , then the burden of proof is on u , u talk to the useless support team , no one can help ,scammers have more protection in the platform than serious users this happens everyday, stressful and frustarting

list_of_reviews.review_title: Direct AED - Low Fees & Zero Withdrawl Fees
list_of_reviews.review: OKX Supports Direct and Instant AED Bank wires. Their trading fees are lower than Binance and OKX is the only exchange with Zero Withdrawal fees. The end to end fees are lower plus it has an open source on Chain Wallet. Don't leave more than 0.02 (2 millions Sats) on Any exchange.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Your facial verification process is…
list_of_reviews.review: Your facial verification process is nonsense, other apps does not give me a tough time like yours, I can't keep coming back after every 30 minutes to verify. Improve on that please

list_of_reviews.review_title: It was easy to set up the account and to manouver
list_of_reviews.review: It was easy to set up the account and a nice surprise to see that I got some bitcoin. The reason I got OKX was a person from Bolbooll.com who tried to hussle money out of me. She managed to let me pay 155 Euro, after that I figured out she was playing a scam on me. The bad thing was losing money. The good thing was finding you. I recon there is nothing you can do to recuperate or prevent this scam for other people, if there is, please let me know. I talked to a lawyer, who told me that bolbooll "earned" 100 million.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They sell your number to other parties
list_of_reviews.review: They sell your number to other parties, who keep calling you incessantly, as mentioned in previous reviews. Although I've made an effort to block each number, they continue to call from different numbers. Easy to invest, but difficult to cash out on the platform. You keep ignoring my questions. To find a solution at this time, I would suggest choosing Futurewise.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Works very well indeed
list_of_reviews.review: Works very well indeed, but i saw that you can hack the system with the Developer tool of google to see other clients

list_of_reviews.review_title: Refusal to return profits
list_of_reviews.review: On the 20th of August OKX asked me to deposit £5,000 to Blockchain in order to release my funds. After depositing the money I was informed that all the money would be in my account within 2 hours. I still don't have the money and can't get a reply via the telephone and any emails just come back saying "not known ". I was using a "reputable " financial adviser, Ryan O'connell to trade on my behalf and my case worker is Alex Bell. I am currently going through the Financial Ombudsman and think we will probably have to take it to court.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried to get my UID number
list_of_reviews.review: Tried to get my UID number, impossible to find unlike Bybit and others where it is clearly visible. Spent 1 hour searching and trying what must be the dumbest bot I have ever come accross. I still do not know my UID number. Uninstalled app after reading all the stories here of frozen accounts

list_of_reviews.review_title: AML check
list_of_reviews.review: I have gone through an AML check and OKX have taken £10k of my money and said that my bank had blocked the payment back, they said "This may occur due to problems when depositing the funds for AML such as bank blocks, card blocks, etc. which have red-flagged the system and are preventing us from automatically withdrawing your funds for security reasons." this seems like a big scam

list_of_reviews.review_title: They are scammers hold my 1300 usd…
list_of_reviews.review: They are scammers hold my 1300 usd without any reason and even not telling any thing I lost my email they not want any verification only need my email back for contact total fruad

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account was banned overnight
list_of_reviews.review: My account was banned overnight, I believe it had over 50,000 USDT on it, and all they say is that it was frozen for a suspicious transaction. But I only used it for storage and nothing else. The answer is always believing I violated the OKX 7.8 policy and will never get it back. AVOID USING THE APP BECAUSE IF YOU HAVE MONEY IN IT YOU WILL BE BANNED

list_of_reviews.review_title: Your money is not safe the exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: Your money is not safe the exchange gets hacked all the time, just google "okx hack" and see for yourself, they suspended my account and wanted a list of ridiculous things.this is a summary of the story if you are stupid enough to give them your personnel details you deserve to lose your money: On Monday, June 10, OKX experienced significant outflows of $204 million in the past 24 hours and $633 million over the past week, according to DeFi Llama. This follows reports of a coordinated hack that targeted two OKX users, bypassing the platform’s security measures.

list_of_reviews.review_title: They will suspend your account be cautions…
list_of_reviews.review: I verified my account and started using their platform. Received an airdrop and started trading then after one month all of a sudden they asked me to provide my source of income. The tokens which I received is by using their provided wallet address and meme so I told the customer support everything and send the screenshot but they don't care all they wanted was to suspend my account and they did it. If you are in crypto trading just use Binance they won't bother you.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid Okex🚩🚩I requested my account to…
list_of_reviews.review: Avoid Okex🚩🚩I requested my account to be freezed because I lost email. The account was freezed very fast ✅, That was in the year 2022 , Now I wanted to unfreeze it and use new email address. I contacted support on app gave me case I'd and told me to follow by emails, it is 2 years now going back and forth from app to email, I provided my Id , selfie, videos I even requested live video call to reopen my account but no success. This might be a scam exchange unlike Binance. Recent ticket number 6173548. Always failing me , is there any way I can havé back my account? Or just leave it guys?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Withdrawal Returned by Binance but OKX is not returning my amount.
list_of_reviews.review: I had a withdrawal of 28 USDT to send it to my friend through TON Network, but unfortunately I missed to write a memo code and my friend complained to his exchange (Binance), they returned the amount in 3 days to my OKX account but it didn't arrive to my OKX and OKX is keep asking me for proofs, I have provided all the details and proofs through videos and pictures, which they wanted to return my amount but they keep telling me things just like I am talking to some robot. Please help me getting out of this mess and please don't suggest to complain on OKX support this is useless. Its been almost a month but my OKX support is useless and unable to send me my small amount back. Ticket Number is 6150416.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Lost Money Due to Poor Service – Be Cautious
list_of_reviews.review: OKX scammed me out of my money with delays and zero customer support. It’s been a nightmare. I’ve since turned to InvestorAlliance L.L.C., which offers a secure, reliable platform with real support. If you value your investments, it’s worth looking into better alternatives.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Direct AED - Low Fees & Zero Withdrawl Fees
list_of_reviews.review: OKX Supports Direct and Instant AED Bank wires. Their trading fees are lower than Binance and OKX is the only exchange with Zero Withdrawal fees. The end to end fees are lower plus it has an open source on Chain Wallet. Don't leave more than 0.02 (2 millions Sats) on Any exchange.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Your facial verification process is…
list_of_reviews.review: Your facial verification process is nonsense, other apps does not give me a tough time like yours, I can't keep coming back after every 30 minutes to verify. Improve on that please

list_of_reviews.review_title: Poor Customer Service and Unfulfilled Promises
list_of_reviews.review: This company has terrible customer service and makes empty promises. I deposited 107 Ton Coin, worth around $534 USD, but I accidentally forgot to include the memo. I contacted their customer service on October 23rd for help, but they only responded with copied-and-pasted messages. Despite multiple follow-ups, they continue to tell me to “wait,” which feels like a stalling tactic to keep my money. I strongly advise against investing with this company.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Impossible to close position
list_of_reviews.review: I am currently in a short position while writing this review. I had a stop set at 14% profit, and the price hit that level. However, OKX canceled the stop order. As the price continued to drop, I tried to close my position and reached out to them for assistance. The price is now 4% in loss, and despite my efforts to close, they’ve only responded with generic instructions like 'click the button.' I’ve sent 14 different screenshots showing that I am unable to close the position, yet they haven't provided a solution, and I continue to lose money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: worst platform ever,scammers P2P
list_of_reviews.review: worst platform ever,P2P  plenty of scammers who re encouraged by the poor service and support and the worst process  i refer u to my order 241023063701398 , my assets 2000 $ have been blocked for 14 hours and i talked to 5 support agents no one could help , i wasted hours and hours talking , no one helped each p2P trasbaction is a hell , because scammers are trying to benifit from the poor process of okx , a scammer is not requird to provide anything, he can create an account in 1 minute and place big order to block all ur assets and say that he paid and dissapear  , then the burden of proof is on u , u talk to the useless support team , no one can help ,scammers have more protection in the platform than serious users this happens everyday, stressful and frustarting

list_of_reviews.review_title: It was easy to set up the account and to manouver
list_of_reviews.review: It was easy to set up the account and a nice surprise to see that I got some bitcoin. The reason I got OKX was a person from Bolbooll.com who tried to hussle money out of me. She managed to let me pay 155 Euro, after that I figured out she was playing a scam on me. The bad thing was losing money. The good thing was finding you. I recon there is nothing you can do to recuperate or prevent this scam for other people, if there is, please let me know. I talked to a lawyer, who told me that bolbooll "earned" 100 million.

list_of_reviews.review_title: njustified Account Suspension for Over 100 Days — This is Clear Theft and Fraud
list_of_reviews.review: I am writing to express my extreme dissatisfaction and concern over the unjustified suspension of my account, which has now been inactive for over 100 days. It has been more than 60 business days, the timeframe you initially provided, and yet no action has been taken to resolve the situation. This prolonged inaction makes it abundantly clear that OKX is deliberately withholding my funds without any valid reason, which amounts to nothing less than theft and fraud.My account has been active for two years without any issues, and my only interactions on your platform have been with close family and friends. Despite this, you have frozen my account without providing any legitimate explanation, and I believe this is a clear abuse of power and misuse of my assets.If this matter is not resolved immediately, I will take it upon myself to publicly expose OKX's actions as fraudulent behavior. I will ensure that this message is widely shared so others are fully aware of the risks of entrusting OKX with their funds.This situation is absolutely unacceptable, and I demand that my account be reinstated without further delay. Failure to address this immediately will result in me pursuing all possible legal actions and making sure your fraudulent actions are exposed to the public.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Works very well indeed
list_of_reviews.review: Works very well indeed, but i saw that you can hack the system with the Developer tool of google to see other clients

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account Frozen, Finally Retrieved Funds After Three Months of Effort
list_of_reviews.review: I am a practicing attorney, and my initial experience with the OKX platform was quite positive. However, following a recent transaction, my account was suddenly restricted, and I was unable to make any withdrawals. A substantial amount of $180,311 was frozen in my account, and the platform didn’t provide a clear reason for the restriction, which left me feeling quite confused and anxious.As a legal professional, I am familiar with compliance and review processes, so over the next three months, I proactively submitted all the documents requested by the platform to verify the legitimacy of my account. I also reached out to contacts in the platform’s compliance department to help expedite the issue. It was an exhausting period, with numerous back-and-forth communications, most of which yielded slow progress.Fortunately, after repeatedly providing documentation and following up, my account was finally released after three months, and I was able to retrieve all my funds. This experience taught me a lot and made me realize how crucial strong customer support and transparent risk control processes are when choosing a platform. If you face a similar issue, feel free to reach out for assistance; my Telegram is:@DuxianshenFor other users, my advice is to ensure your personal identity and funds are legitimate, and if you encounter a similar situation, stay persistent, keep submitting documents, and consistently follow up. OKX still has room for improvement in its risk control processes, but I am thankful that my issue was eventually resolved.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Refusal to return profits
list_of_reviews.review: On the 20th of August OKX asked me to deposit £5,000 to Blockchain in order to release my funds. After depositing the money I was informed that all the money would be in my account within 2 hours. I still don't have the money and can't get a reply via the telephone and any emails just come back saying "not known ". I was using a "reputable " financial adviser, Ryan O'connell to trade on my behalf and my case worker is Alex Bell. I am currently going through the Financial Ombudsman and think we will probably have to take it to court.

list_of_reviews.review_title: AML check
list_of_reviews.review: I have gone through an AML check and OKX have taken £10k of my money and said that my bank had blocked the payment back, they said "This may occur due to problems when depositing the funds for AML such as bank blocks, card blocks, etc. which have red-flagged the system and are preventing us from automatically withdrawing your funds for security reasons." this seems like a big scam

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried to get my UID number
list_of_reviews.review: Tried to get my UID number, impossible to find unlike Bybit and others where it is clearly visible. Spent 1 hour searching and trying what must be the dumbest bot I have ever come accross. I still do not know my UID number. Uninstalled app after reading all the stories here of frozen accounts

But I only used it for storage and nothing else. The answer is always believing I violated the OKX 7.8 policy and will never get it back. AVOID USING THE APP BECAUSE IF YOU HAVE MONEY IN IT YOU WILL BE BANNED

list_of_reviews.review_title: I'm not sure why many people are giving…
list_of_reviews.review: I'm not sure why many people are giving negative reviews on OKX , For me it's better than Binance, actually, it's the best platform when it comes to P2P support , quick and fair enough for both sides . I got scammed once, but it was my fault and they couldn't help it. So, i don't blame them , try BYBIT to see the difference in CS that can take weeks to respond if they ever respond leaving you and your loss alone . As a super merchant for almost a year and a regular customer for two years , I'm satisfied.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Poor Customer Service and Unfulfilled Promises
list_of_reviews.review: This company has terrible customer service and makes empty promises. I deposited 107 Ton Coin, worth around $534 USD, but I accidentally forgot to include the memo. I contacted their customer service on October 23rd for help, but they only responded with copied-and-pasted messages. Despite multiple follow-ups, they continue to tell me to “wait,” which feels like a stalling tactic to keep my money. I strongly advise against investing with this company.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Impossible to close position
list_of_reviews.review: I am currently in a short position while writing this review. I had a stop set at 14% profit, and the price hit that level. However, OKX canceled the stop order. As the price continued to drop, I tried to close my position and reached out to them for assistance. The price is now 4% in loss, and despite my efforts to close, they’ve only responded with generic instructions like 'click the button.' I’ve sent 14 different screenshots showing that I am unable to close the position, yet they haven't provided a solution, and I continue to lose money.

list_of_reviews.review_title: njustified Account Suspension for Over 100 Days — This is Clear Theft and Fraud
list_of_reviews.review: I am writing to express my extreme dissatisfaction and concern over the unjustified suspension of my account, which has now been inactive for over 100 days. It has been more than 60 business days, the timeframe you initially provided, and yet no action has been taken to resolve the situation. This prolonged inaction makes it abundantly clear that OKX is deliberately withholding my funds without any valid reason, which amounts to nothing less than theft and fraud.My account has been active for two years without any issues, and my only interactions on your platform have been with close family and friends. Despite this, you have frozen my account without providing any legitimate explanation, and I believe this is a clear abuse of power and misuse of my assets.If this matter is not resolved immediately, I will take it upon myself to publicly expose OKX's actions as fraudulent behavior. I will ensure that this message is widely shared so others are fully aware of the risks of entrusting OKX with their funds.This situation is absolutely unacceptable, and I demand that my account be reinstated without further delay. Failure to address this immediately will result in me pursuing all possible legal actions and making sure your fraudulent actions are exposed to the public.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Refusal to return profits
list_of_reviews.review: On the 20th of August OKX asked me to deposit £5,000 to Blockchain in order to release my funds. After depositing the money I was informed that all the money would be in my account within 2 hours. I still don't have the money and can't get a reply via the telephone and any emails just come back saying "not known ". I was using a "reputable " financial adviser, Ryan O'connell to trade on my behalf and my case worker is Alex Bell. I am currently going through the Financial Ombudsman and think we will probably have to take it to court.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried to get my UID number
list_of_reviews.review: Tried to get my UID number, impossible to find unlike Bybit and others where it is clearly visible. Spent 1 hour searching and trying what must be the dumbest bot I have ever come accross. I still do not know my UID number. Uninstalled app after reading all the stories here of frozen accounts

list_of_reviews.review_title: AML check
list_of_reviews.review: I have gone through an AML check and OKX have taken £10k of my money and said that my bank had blocked the payment back, they said "This may occur due to problems when depositing the funds for AML such as bank blocks, card blocks, etc. which have red-flagged the system and are preventing us from automatically withdrawing your funds for security reasons." this seems like a big scam

list_of_reviews.review_title: Direct AED - Low Fees & Zero Withdrawl Fees
list_of_reviews.review: OKX Supports Direct and Instant AED Bank wires. Their trading fees are lower than Binance and OKX is the only exchange with Zero Withdrawal fees. The end to end fees are lower plus it has an open source on Chain Wallet. Don't leave more than 0.02 (2 millions Sats) on Any exchange.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Your money is not safe the exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: Your money is not safe the exchange gets hacked all the time, just google "okx hack" and see for yourself, they suspended my account and wanted a list of ridiculous things.this is a summary of the story if you are stupid enough to give them your personnel details you deserve to lose your money: On Monday, June 10, OKX experienced significant outflows of $204 million in the past 24 hours and $633 million over the past week, according to DeFi Llama. This follows reports of a coordinated hack that targeted two OKX users, bypassing the platform’s security measures.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Account Frozen, Finally Retrieved Funds After Three Months of Effort
list_of_reviews.review: I am a practicing attorney, and my initial experience with the OKX platform was quite positive. However, following a recent transaction, my account was suddenly restricted, and I was unable to make any withdrawals. A substantial amount of $180,311 was frozen in my account, and the platform didn’t provide a clear reason for the restriction, which left me feeling quite confused and anxious.As a legal professional, I am familiar with compliance and review processes, so over the next three months, I proactively submitted all the documents requested by the platform to verify the legitimacy of my account. I also reached out to contacts in the platform’s compliance department to help expedite the issue. It was an exhausting period, with numerous back-and-forth communications, most of which yielded slow progress.Fortunately, after repeatedly providing documentation and following up, my account was finally released after three months, and I was able to retrieve all my funds. This experience taught me a lot and made me realize how crucial strong customer support and transparent risk control processes are when choosing a platform. If you face a similar issue, feel free to reach out for assistance; my Telegram is:@DuxianshenFor other users, my advice is to ensure your personal identity and funds are legitimate, and if you encounter a similar situation, stay persistent, keep submitting documents, and consistently follow up. OKX still has room for improvement in its risk control processes, but I am thankful that my issue was eventually resolved.

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account was banned overnight
list_of_reviews.review: My account was banned overnight, I believe it had over 50,000 USDT on it, and all they say is that it was frozen for a suspicious transaction. But I only used it for storage and nothing else. The answer is always believing I violated the OKX 7.8 policy and will never get it back. AVOID USING THE APP BECAUSE IF YOU HAVE MONEY IN IT YOU WILL BE BANNED

list_of_reviews.review_title: OKX Review: A Shady Scam Operation Disguised as an Exchange
list_of_reviews.review: OKX Review: A Shady Scam Operation Disguised as an ExchangeAs a high-volume trader on OKX for over six years, I never expected to be treated like this. When OKX removed my local currency support, so I have been using an external fiat gateway for over a year, it was a whitelisted withdrawal address in my account. Then one day this fiat gateway had been sanctioned by the U.S. which I was not aware about. After withdrawing a mere $1,000—an insignificant amount relative to my overall balance—OKX suspended my entire account. Not even elaborating a bit or warning that one of the addresses on my white list is now sanctioned. They literally wanted me to use it. What followed was an exhausting ordeal. For over 50 days their support was simply copy/pasting the same message “wait, we don’t know how long, we can’t say why your funds are blocked (at first I was not aware of the sanctions and had to figure it out myself)”. After 50 days, dozens of emails and public complaints in their community, they finally allowed me to withdraw my funds—but not all of them. They held onto the $1,000 and kept it for themselves without any valid justification.To put things in perspective, I had the exact same issue on Bitget. Bitget resolved the issue in under six days, releasing all my funds and keeping nothing. They handled the situation with transparency and respect for their users.OKX, on the other hand, is run by the shadiest bunch of scammers. They took advantage of regulatory issues to enrich themselves under the pretense of “following the law.” Instead of handling things professionally, they exploited the situation to seize my funds and refused to give a clear reason for keeping my money.For anyone considering using OKX, think twice. There are reputable exchanges out there that treat customers with integrity. OKX, unfortunately, is not one of them. Withdraw all your funds from OKX asap.

Concerns often involve "repetitive content," "lack of personalization," "automated interactions," and "poor customer support," indicating mixed satisfaction with personalized experiences and issue resolution.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the okx.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a mixed user satisfaction, with positive feedback highlighting strong user engagement and interactive experiences as key strengths. However, negative reviews frequently mention issues such as repetitive content, lack of personalization, and poor customer support, indicating areas where the service could improve. The main themes suggest that while users appreciate the network activity and interactive elements, they are frustrated by impersonal, automated interactions and unresolved issues. Critical issues include the need for more personalized content and better customer support to enhance user satisfaction. For potential improvement, focusing on diversifying content, enhancing personalization, and improving customer support could address the negative feedback and improve overall user experience.
